S06psp_4u:583: avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:584_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:584_1: paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. abhyāsannās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06psp_4u:584_2: ca bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇasya vyākariṣyanti vā, (PSP_4:17)
S06psp_4u:585: avinivartanīyā vā te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher,
S06psp_4u:586: yeṣāṃ svayam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. ity avinivartanīyaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:587: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikād aṭavīkāntārān niṣkrāmet,
S06psp_4u:588_1: niṣkrāmen niṣkramya paśyed grāmasya nagarasya nigamasya vā pūrvāni nimittāni gopālakān
S06psp_4u:588_2: vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmān vā vanāni vā udyānāni vā udyānanimittāni vā grāmān
S06psp_4u:588_3: vā nagarāṇi vā nigamān vā rājadhānīn vā rāṣṭrāṇi vā pūrvanimittāni grāmasya nagarasya
S06psp_4u:588_4: nigamasya vā dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati yādṛśānīmāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante abhyāsanna ito
S06psp_4u:588_5: grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā rājadhānyo vā rāṣṭrāṇi vā bhaviṣyanti. sa āśvāsaprāpto bhavet,
S06psp_4u:589_0: na cāsya bhūyo bhavati caurabhayaṃ vā caṇḍālabhayaṃ vā caṇḍamṛgabhayaṃ vā bubhukṣābhayaṃ
S06psp_4u:589_1: vā pipāsābhayaṃ vā. evam eva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svayam iyaṃ
S06psp_4u:589_2: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06psp_4u:590_0: veditavyam etad bhagavann abhyāsanno 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati vyākaraṇasyānuttarāyāḥ
S06psp_4u:590_1: samyaksaṃbodher na cireṇābhisaṃbhotsyate. tena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na bhetavyaṃ
S06psp_4u:590_2: śrāvakabhūmer vā pratyekabuddhabhūmer vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:591: imāni tāni pūrvanimittāni yad utemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya.
S06psp_4u:592: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:593: evam etac chāriputraivam etat. iti niryāṇaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:594: pratibhātu te śāriputra bhūyasyā mātrayā buddhānubhāvena.
S06psp_4u:596: tadyathā pi nāma bhagavan puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:597: sa gacchet mahāsamudraṃ darśanāya yathā yathā gacchet mahāsamudraṃ tathā tathā paśyet stambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:598: tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre ito mahāsamudro nāsanna (PSP_4:18)
S06psp_4u:600: na hi mahāsamudrasyābhyāse kaścit stambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ vā dṛśyante. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:601: sa yathā yathā gacchet mahāsamudraṃ darśanāya tathā tathā na paśyet stambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:602: tasyaivaṃ bhavati na dūre ito mahāsamudra āsanna ito mahāsamudraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:603: na hi mahāsamudrasyāsanne kaścit stambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ vā dṛśyate,
S06psp_4u:604: kiṃ cāpi sa puruṣaś cakṣuṣā mahāsamudran na paśyati. atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati,
S06psp_4u:606: neto bhūyo dūre mahāsamudra iti. evam eva bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_4u:607: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇutā udgṛhṇatā dhārayatā vācayatā paryavāpnuvatā yoniśo manasikurvatā,
S06psp_4u:608_0: evaṃ cintayitavyaṃ kiṃ cāpy ahaṃ tena bhagavatā na saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:608_1: samyaksaṃbodhau iyadbhiḥ kalpair iyadbhiḥ kalpaśatair iyadbhiḥ kalpasahasrair iyadbhiḥ
S06psp_4u:608_2: kalpaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrais tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:609: atha ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_4u:610: āsannībhūto 'smy anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vyākaraṇasyeti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:611_0: tathā hy aham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhe darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
S06psp_4u:611_1: śravaṇāya śrutvā codgṛhṇāmi dhārayāmi vācayāmi paryavāpnomi yoniśaś ca manasikaromi.
S06psp_4u:612_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu stambheṣu ākarajāteṣu
S06psp_4u:612_1: veditavyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakair manuṣyair netaś cireṇa patrāṇi ca puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
S06psp_4u:613: imāni tāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyante netaś cireṇa patrāṇi ca puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:614: āttamanaskā jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā bhaviṣyanti tāni ca pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭvā stambeṣu,
S06psp_4u:615: evam eva bhagavan yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravanāya śrutvā (PSP_4:19)
S06psp_4u:616: codgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:617_0: bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ. veditavyam
S06psp_4u:617_1: etad bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvakair eva kuśalamūlair upanīto
S06psp_4u:618_0: yo 'ham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhe darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya
S06psp_4u:618_1: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyeyaṃ tatra devaputrāḥ pūrvabuddhadarśino
S06psp_4u:618_2: bhavanti. te pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ pūrvakāṇām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
S06psp_4u:618_3: imāny eva pūrvanimittāni abhūvan vyākaraṇāya na cireṇāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_4u:620: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strīgurviṇī sā yathā yathā āsannaprasavā bhavati tathā tathāsyāḥ kāyo veṣṭate 'dhimātraṃ ca kāye vedanāklamathaś ca jāyate,
S06psp_4u:625: tābhir vedanābhir vartamānābhir alpabhāṣyā ca bhavati,
S06psp_4u:627_0: tena pūrvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena bhāvitena niṣevitena imām evaṃrūpāṃ vedanāṃ
S06psp_4u:627_1: pratyanubhavāmīti. veditavyam evaṃ tato 'nyābhiḥ strībhir yādṛśāny asyāḥ striyo nimittāni
S06psp_4u:627_2: dṛśyante na cireṇaiveyaṃ strī prasaviṣyati. evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
S06psp_4u:627_4: paripakvakuśalamūlānām iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm
S06psp_4u:627_5: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:628: veditavyam etan na cireṇaiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:630: sādhu sādhu śāriputra idam api te śāriputra buddhānubhāvena pratibhānam utpannam. iti kṣiprābhisaṃbodhaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:631: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:632: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anugṛhītāḥ suparīttāś ceme bodhisattvā mahāsattvās (PSP_4:20)
S06psp_4u:635_0: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipannā
S06psp_4u:635_1: lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāñ ca manuṣyānāñ cānuttarāyai
S06psp_4u:635_2: samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhante bodhisattvacaryāñ caranto 'nekāni sattvaśatāni anekāni
S06psp_4u:635_3: sattvasahasrāṇi anekāni sattvaśatasahasrāṇi anekāni sattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anugrahīṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:636: caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhir dānena priyavadyena arthacaryayā samānārthatayā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:637_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā
S06psp_4u:637_1: caiteṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti. ātmanā ca dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca
S06psp_4u:637_2: dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:637_3: pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:637_4: pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:637_5: ātmanā ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:637_6: ātmanā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:637_7: te ca prajñāpāramitām āgamya upāyakauśalyena sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayanti
S06psp_4u:637_8: na cātmanā sākṣāt kurvanti. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve,
S06psp_4u:638_0: pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayanti na cātmanā pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣāt kurvanti.
S06psp_4u:638_1: ātmanā cāvinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim ākrāmanti parāṃś cāvinivartanīyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:639_0: anyāṃś ca bodhisattvān buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sattvān paripācayanti
S06psp_4u:639_1: parāṃś ca sattvaparipāke samādāpayanti. ātmanā cābhijñā utpādayanti parāṃś cābhijñāprāptaye
S06psp_4u:639_2: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca dhāraṇīmukhaṃ pariśodhayanti parān api dhāraṇīmukhapariśuddhaye
S06psp_4u:639_3: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca pratibhānasaṃpadaṃ pratilabhante parān api pratibhānasaṃpadi
S06psp_4u:639_4: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca rūpasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti parān api rūpasaṃpatpratilābhāya
S06psp_4u:639_5: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti parān api (PSP_4:21)
S06psp_4u:640_0: lakṣaṇasaṃpatpratilābhāya samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca kumārabhūtasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti
S06psp_4u:640_1: parān api kumārabhūtasaṃpatpratigrahāya samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca bodhipakṣyān dharmān
S06psp_4u:640_2: niṣpādayanti parān api bodhipakṣyadharmapariniṣpattaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca satyavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadhāraṇīmukhān
S06psp_4u:640_3: utpādayanti parān apy eṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni utpādayanti
S06psp_4u:640_4: parān api caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvida utpādayanti
S06psp_4u:640_5: parān api caturaḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ prāptaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:640_6: mahāmuditāṃ mahopekṣāṃ vibhāvayanti parān api caturapramāṇā vibhāvanāyai samādāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:640_7: ātmanā cāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān niṣpādayanti parān api aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
S06psp_4u:640_8: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti parāṃś ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:640_9: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān vijahanti parān api sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśotsargāya
S06psp_4u:640_10: samādāpayanti. ātmanā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante parāṃś ca samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:640_11: abhisaṃbodhaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca dharmacakraṃ pravartayanti parāṃś ca dharmacakraṃ
S06psp_4u:642: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:643_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad bahuguṇasamanvāgatās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
S06psp_4u:643_1: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_4u:643_2: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
S06psp_4u:645: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpasya vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:646: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:650_0: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
S06psp_4u:650_1: pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
S06psp_4u:651_0: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāñ
S06psp_4u:651_1: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati
S06psp_4u:654: yadā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpasya parihāṇiṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:655: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:657_0: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇa
S06psp_4u:658: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. ity avṛddhyaparihāṇiprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:659: punar aparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharma iti na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:664: kuśalam akuśalaṃ vyākṛtam avyākṛtam iti na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:675: prajñāpāramitān na samanupaśyati yāvat sarvajñatān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:676: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:677: tathā hi subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇatām upādāya avinivartanīyatām upādāya riktatām upādāya tucchatām upādāya asāratām upādāya vaśikatām upādāya.
S06psp_4u:684: saṃskārā, vijñānācintyatayā subhūte 'cintyaṃ deśyate. dānapāramitācintyatayā acintyaṃ deśyate,
S06psp_4u:685_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitācintyatayācintyaṃ
S06psp_4u:685_3: sarvajñatācintyatayā subhūte 'cintyaṃ deśyate. sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_4u:685_4: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam acintyam iti na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_4u:687_0: vijñānam acintyam iti na saṃjānīte paripūrayiṣyati prajñāpāramitām. evaṃ dhātvāyatanāni
S06psp_4u:687_1: pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni pāramitāḥ śūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_4u:692: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:697: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:701: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:707_0: vijñānasvabhāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaṃ
S06psp_4u:710: sarvajñatāsvabhāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:713_2: sarvajñatā acintyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito
S06psp_4u:713_3: bhavati ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlo bhavati bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ
S06psp_4u:720: sarvajñatāgambhīratayā subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā. ity avikalpaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:723_1: samyaksaṃbodher dātrī dharmacakrapravartikeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā. iti phalaratnadānaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:732: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad asyāṃ gambhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bahavo 'ntarāyā utpadyeran.
S06psp_4u:736: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitā kṣipram eva likhitavyā,
S06psp_4u:737: uddiśatā dhārayatā vācayatā svādhyāyatā yoniśaś ca manasikurvatā,
S06psp_4u:738_0: bhāvayatā kṣipram eva bhāvayitavyā. mā khalv asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:738_1: likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:738_2: bhāvyamānāyāṃ vāntarāyaḥ syād iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:739_0: sacet subhūte yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māsena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhet tena
S06psp_4u:739_1: likhitavyaiva bhavet. saced dvābhyāṃ tribhiś ca caturbhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhir
S06psp_4u:739_2: aṣṭābhir yāvat saṃvatsareṇa likhet tena likhitavyaiva bhaved evam upadeṣṭavyā dhārayitavyā
S06psp_4u:739_3: vācayitavyā svādhyātavyā yoniśo manasikartavyā. sacet māsena vā bhāvayet tena bhāvayitavyā
S06psp_4u:739_4: bhavet yāvat saṃvatsareṇa bhāvayet tena bhāvayitavyā bhavet. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:742: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yad asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyāya yogam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:745_0: kiṃ cāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām udyogam āpadyeta antarāya
S06psp_4u:745_1: karaṇāya yad utālikhanāya yāvad abhāvanāyai bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
S06psp_4u:745_2: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhata uddiśato dhārayato vācayataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato
S06psp_4u:748: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:749_0: kasya bhagavann anubhāvena māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:749_1: mahāsattvānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ
S06psp_4u:751_0: buddhānubhāvena śāriputra māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:751_1: mahāsattvānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ
S06psp_4u:751_2: svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatām. ye 'pi te śāriputra samantā daśasu
S06psp_4u:751_3: dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:752: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anubhāvāt. te 'pi buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāhariṣyanti anuparigrahīṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:753: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartum,
S06psp_4u:754: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatām. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:755: na hi śāriputra buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā śaknoty antarāyaḥ kartum. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:756: dharmaṃ teṣāṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyā asaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:757_0: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhato dhārayato vācayata uddiśataḥ
S06psp_4u:757_1: svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato bhāvayato bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāharanti.
S06psp_4u:758_0: veditavyaṃ tena śāriputra kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:758_1: likhatā vā dhārayatā vā vācayatā vā uddiśatā vā svādhyāyatā vā yoniśo manasikurvatā
S06psp_4u:758_2: vā bhāvayatā vā buddhānubhāvenāham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhāmi dhārayāmi
S06psp_4u:758_3: vācayāmi uddiśāmi svādhyāyāmi bhāvayāmi yoniśo manasikaromi.
S06psp_4u:760_0: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati
S06psp_4u:760_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati bhāvayiṣyati
S06psp_4u:765_0: yathā vadasi yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:765_1: likhiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati
S06psp_4u:765_2: bhāvayiṣyati veditavyaṃ śāriputra sarvan tadbuddhānubhāvena sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:768_0: jñātās te bhagavan jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te bhagavan māṃsacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:768_1: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvadigbhāge yāvad
S06psp_4u:768_2: daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06psp_4u:769_0: teṣāñ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:769_1: vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante.
S06psp_4u:772_0: jñātās te śāriputra jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te śāriputra māṃsacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:772_1: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvad
S06psp_4u:772_2: daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06psp_4u:773_0: teṣāñ ca ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:773_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:774: te khalu punar mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā abhyāsannī bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:776_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā
S06psp_4u:776_1: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti. te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_4u:776_2: kuladuhitaraś ca iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām adhimuktibahulā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:777: ye 'pīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ. (PSP_4:28)
S06psp_4u:778: te 'pi śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca jñātā dṛṣṭāś ca buddhair bhagavadbhis tathāgatāś ca buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti,
S06psp_4u:779_0: teṣām api kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca mahārthaṃ mahānuśaṃsaṃ mahāphalaṃ mahāvipākaṃ
S06psp_4u:779_1: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti. te tena kuśalamūlena na
S06psp_4u:779_2: jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti. te na jātv apāyeṣūpapatsyante devamanuṣyeṣūpapatsyamānā
S06psp_4u:779_3: buddhabodhisattvair avirahitā bhaviṣyanti. avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmiṃ cātikramiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:780: te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā tenaiva kuśalamūlena na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:781: adhyātmaśūnyatayā bahirdhāśūnyatayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:783: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair vimokṣamukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:784: aṣṭābhir vimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:785: abhijñābhiḥ samādhidhāraṇīmukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:786_0: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir yāvad
S06psp_4u:786_1: aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatayā ca.
S06psp_4u:787: iyaṃ ca śāriputra prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:788_0: tatra bhikṣur bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti udgṛhīṣyanti
S06psp_4u:788_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. te tena kuśalamūlena
S06psp_4u:788_2: na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti te devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ
S06psp_4u:788_3: pāramitābhir abhyudgamiṣyanti buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā mānayamānāḥ
S06psp_4u:788_4: pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāsyanti yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:789_0: seyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā dakṣiṇāpathād vartanyāṃ pracariṣyati. tatrāpi
S06psp_4u:789_1: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti
S06psp_4u:790_0: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:790_2: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:791: devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:792: buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā mānayamānāḥ pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:793: sā khalu punar iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vartanyā uttarāpathe pracariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:794: tatrāpi śāriputra bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:795: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:796: te devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:797: buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:798: anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:799: tatra śāriputra iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:800: na hi śāriputra maṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmāntarddhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:801: samanvāhṛtās te śāriputra mayā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca,
S06psp_4u:802: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
S06psp_4u:803_0: ye 'pi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:803_1: likhitvā ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis,
S06psp_4u:804_0: te ca khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraś ca tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ
S06psp_4u:804_1: gamiṣyanti devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_4u:804_2: abhyudgamya buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayanto pūjayanto 'nupūrveṇa
S06psp_4u:804_3: tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:806: kuladuhitaraś ca tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās tathāgatena praśastās te tathāgatena,
S06psp_4u:807_0: ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti
S06psp_4u:807_1: dhriyante yāpayanti tair api tathāgatair api arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair dṛṣṭās te
S06psp_4u:807_2: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās te praśastās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06psp_4u:809: vaistārikī punar iyaṃ bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:812_0: iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi
S06psp_4u:812_1: vaistārikī bhaviṣyati. tatra śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye te kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_4u:812_2: kuladuhitaraś ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:812_3: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya
S06psp_4u:812_4: ca pratipatsyante. cirayānasaṃprasthitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bahubuddhaparyupāsitās
S06psp_4u:812_5: te tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā
S06psp_4u:812_6: ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca
S06psp_4u:814: kiyantas te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti?
S06psp_4u:815_0: , ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge śrutvā
S06psp_4u:815_1: likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:817: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge bahavo bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:818: alpakāḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:819_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:819_1: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante.
S06psp_4u:821_0: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ya
S06psp_4u:821_1: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:821_2: na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:822: anubaddhā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ paripṛcchitāś ca paripraśnīkṛtāś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:823: prajñāpāramitā paripūrṇā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:824: dānapāramitāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:825: adhyātmaśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:826: bahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:827: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,

S06psp_4u:878_1: kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā gaveṣamāṇānāṃ paryeṣamāṇānām etāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ kecil lapsyante?

S06psp_4u:884: kiṃ punar bhagavann ime gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotpatsyante?
S06psp_4u:886: gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ śāriputra sūtrāntāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:890: ye śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ tīvreṇa prasādena nirapekṣāḥ kāye jīvite codyogam āpatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06psp_4u:892_1: samuttejayanti saṃpraharṣayanti niveśayanti. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāṇāṃ

S06psp_4u:893: te ṣaṭpāramitāsu yathopadiṣṭāsu pravartamānās tāvad vīryaṃ na saṃśrayiṣyanti yāvan na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyanti. sattvāṃś ca na paripācayiṣyanti,

S06psp_4u:896: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:897: guṇā ime bhagavan parikīrtitās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāsu cariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:899: buddhakṣetrāṇi pariśodhayiṣyanti. kīdṛśāḥ khalu punar bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntarāyā utpatsyante?

S06psp_4u:905: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃś cireṇa pratibhānam utpatsyate,

S06psp_4u:913: anena subhūte paryāyena cireṇa pratibhānam utpatsyate,
S06psp_4u:914: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti kṛcchraprāptiḥ
S06psp_4u:915: punar aparaṃ subhūte atikṣipraṃ pratibhānam utpatsyate tena ca maṃsyate,

S06psp_4u:997_2: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ

S06psp_4u:1001: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣo hastino 'rthiko bhavet,

S06psp_4u:1003: subhūte 'pi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet.
S06psp_4u:1007_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:1007_1: riñcitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakayānapratisaṃyuktāḥ pratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktās
S06psp_4u:1007_2: tān paryavāptavyān maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:1008: subhūte 'pi nu paṇḍitajātīyās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_4u:1012: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma (PSP_4:39)
S06psp_4u:1014: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:1015: sa mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā goṣpadaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta,
S06psp_4u:1016: tasya taṃ goṣpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavet,
S06psp_4u:1017: evaṃpramāṇo mahāsamudra iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:1018: subhūte 'pi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātiko bhavet.
S06psp_4u:1022: evam eva subhūte tathārūpās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā,
S06psp_4u:1023: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā labdhvā vā tām utsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān udgrahītavyān maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:1024: subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_4u:1028: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity uddeśabhraṃśaḥ
S06psp_4u:1029: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:1030: sa sūryācandramasor maṇḍalavimānāt pramāṇam udgrahītavyaṃ manyet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:1031: subhūte vaijayantaṃ paryeṣya vaijayantasamaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmaḥ sūryācandramasor vā maṇḍalavimānāt pramāṇam udgṛhṇīyād,
S06psp_4u:1032: api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo bhavet.
S06psp_4u:1036_0: evam eva subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani ekatyā bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_4u:1036_1: kuladuhitaraś ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā labdhvā vā riñcitvā
S06psp_4u:1036_2: cchorayitvā vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1037: subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyās te bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_4u:1041: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti hetuphalasaṃbandhabhraṃśaḥ
S06psp_4u:1042: punar aparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma kasyacid eva puruṣasya koṭṭarājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhaved,
S06psp_4u:1044: ca yādṛśo 'yaṃ koṭṭarāja iti. sa koṭṭarājasya varṇasaṃsthānenākṛtyānimittaṃ liṅgāni udgṛhyaivaṃ vaded,
S06psp_4u:1045: rājñaś cakravartinaḥ īdṛśo varṇasaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣa iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:1046: subhūte api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet.
S06psp_4u:1050_0: evam eva subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani ekatyā mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06psp_4u:1050_1: ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā labdhvā vā tāṃ riñcitvā cchorayitvā vā
S06psp_4u:1050_2: śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:1051: subhūte 'pi nu te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca paṇḍitajātikāḥ syuḥ.
S06psp_4u:1055: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti niruttarapadabhraṃśaḥ
S06psp_4u:1056: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ bahūni pratibhānāny utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1057_0: yānīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhyamānāṃ vikṣepsyanti. tadyathāpi nāma rūpapratibhānaṃ
S06psp_4u:1059: yāvad anuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhipratibhānam. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1068: anupalambhā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1069_0: na hi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām ime dharmāḥ saṃvidyante. sacet subhūte
S06psp_4u:1069_1: bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā
S06psp_4u:1069_2: likhanebhir dharmo vikṣipyate. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1075: na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1076: na dhyānapāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1077: na sarvaśūnyatānāṃ na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nāryasatyānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1078: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nābhijñānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1079: na sarvasamādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:1080: na daśānāṃ balānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1081: na sarvajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate. yasyāś ca svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1082: so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ. seyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na cābhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo likhitum.
S06psp_4u:1084: sacet punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhāva iti saṃjñāsyanti idam api teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity abhāvābhiniveśāntarāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:1086: ye kecid bhagavan mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarair likhitvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā mayā likhiteti maṃsyante,
S06psp_4u:1087: te 'pi lipiṣv akṣareṣv imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhinivekṣyante,
S06psp_4u:1088: idam api bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti lipyakṣareṣu prajñāpāramitābhiniveśāntarāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:1119: sacet punar bhagavan mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā anakṣarāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhinivekṣyante,
S06psp_4u:1121: anakṣarāṃ dānapāramitām abhinivekṣyante. anakṣaraṃ rūpam abhinivekṣyante,
S06psp_4u:1123_0: anakṣaraṃ vijñānam abhinivekṣyante. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān
S06psp_4u:1123_1: dharmān vimokṣamukhāni satyāni apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr balāni vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_4u:1124: yāvat sarvajñatām anakṣarām abhinivekṣyante. idam api bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1126: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām utpatsyante janapadavitarkā,
S06psp_4u:1127: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1128_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ
S06psp_4u:1128_1: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām utpatsyante grāmamanasikārāḥ nagaramanasikārāḥ nigamamanasikārāḥ
S06psp_4u:1132: kāmavitarkapratisaṃyuktā manasikārāḥ saṃgaṇikā pratisaṃyuktā manasikārā utpatsyante. amī ca subhūte (PSP_4:43)
S06psp_4u:1133_0: 'nye ca bahuvidhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ manasikārā mārakarma veditavyam. imāṃ
S06psp_4u:1133_1: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ māraḥ
S06psp_4u:1133_2: pāpīyān antarāyān vikṣepān upasaṃhariṣyati. iti janapadādimanasikārāntarāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:1134: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatām utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1135: lābhasatkāraślokāś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārās tāṃs te bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsvādayantaḥ,
S06psp_4u:1136: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1138: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān ye te bhaviṣyanti gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntās tān upasaṃhariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1139_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatām.
S06psp_4u:1139_1: na punar atra subhūte bodhisattvair upāyakuśalair gambhīragambhīreṣu sūtrānteṣu māreṇopasaṃhṛteṣu
S06psp_4u:1140_0: na hi subhūte te sūtrāntāḥ sarvajñatāyā āhārakāḥ. tatra subhūte ye 'nupāyakuśalā
S06psp_4u:1140_1: bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā riñciṣyanti yatra
S06psp_4u:1140_2: mayā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām upāyakauśalaṃ vistareṇākhyātam ihaiva gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1140_3: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇopāyakauśalaṃ mārgitavyam. te khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ
S06psp_4u:1140_4: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā tebhyaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktebhyaḥ
S06psp_4u:1140_5: sūtrāntebhya upāyakauśalyaṃ gaveṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:1140_6: mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. i ty amārgeṇopāyakauśalamārgaṇāntarāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:1141: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś cchandakā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitum uddeṣṭuṃ svādhyātuṃ paṭhituṃ,
S06psp_4u:1142: dharmabhāṇakaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti cchandakilāsavaidhuryam
S06psp_4u:1143: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaḥ akilāsī bhaviṣyati imāṃ (PSP_4:44)
S06psp_4u:1144: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayitum udgrahayituṃ deśayituṃ svādhyāyituṃ,
S06psp_4u:1145: dharmaśravaṇikāś ca deśāntarasaṃprasthitā bhaviṣyanti. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1146: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś ca prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitukāmā bhaviṣyanti udgrahītukāmā uddeṣṭukāmāḥ svādhyātukāmā,
S06psp_4u:1147: dharmabhāṇakaś ca deśāntarasaṃprasthito bhaviṣyati. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1149: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako lābhasatkāraślokaguruko bhaviṣyati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraraktaḥ,
S06psp_4u:1150_0: dharmaśravaṇikāś cālpecchāḥ saṃtuṣṭā ārabdhavīryā upasthitasmṛtayaḥ samāhitā ekāgracittāḥ
S06psp_4u:1150_1: prajñāvantaḥ. idam api subhūte visāmagryā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1150_2: yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1151: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś cālpeccho bhaviṣyati saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikta ārabdhavīrya upasthitasmṛtiḥ samāhita ekāgracittaḥ prajñāvān,
S06psp_4u:1152_1: bhaviṣyanti. idam api subhūte visāmagryā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1152_2: yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1154: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇaka āraṇyako bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1155: paiṇḍapātikaḥ pāṃśukūlikaḥ khalupaścādbhaktikaḥ ekāsanikaḥ prasthapiṇḍikaḥ śmāśānika ābhyavakāśiko vṛkṣamūliko naiṣadyiko yathāsaṃstarikas traicīvarikaḥ,
S06psp_4u:1156_0: dharmaśravaṇikāś ca nāraṇyakā bhaviṣyanti na paiṇḍapātikā na pāṃśukūlikā na khalupaścādbhaktikā
S06psp_4u:1156_1: na ekāsanikā na prasthapiṇḍikā na śmāśānikā nābhyavakāśikā na vṛkṣamūlikā na naiṣadyikā
S06psp_4u:1156_2: na yathāsaṃstarikā na traicīvarikāḥ. idam api subhūte visāmagryā iha gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1157: svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1158: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇika āraṇyako bhaviṣyati yāvat traicīvariko,
S06psp_4u:1159_0: dharmabhāṇakaś ca nāraṇyako bhaviṣyati yāvan na traicīvarikaḥ. idam api subhūte visāmagryā
S06psp_4u:1159_1: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśaś
S06psp_4u:1159_2: ca manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.

S06psp_4u:1164_0: dharmaśravaṇikaś cāśrāddho bhaviṣyati na kalyāṇadharmā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ

S06psp_4u:1327: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1328: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇa bodhisattvān upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1329: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati sa bodhisattvo bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_4u:1330: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāpnoti sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā prāpnoti pratyekabodhiṃ vā prāpnoti,
S06psp_4u:1333: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ yāvad (PSP_4:53)
S06psp_4u:1335: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti mārasya pāpīyaso bhedaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:1336: punar aparaṃ subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyāṃ bahūni mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1337: yāny antarāyakarāṇi bhaviṣyanti tāni mārakarmāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivarjayitavyāni.
S06psp_4u:1339: katamāni tāni bhagavan mārakarmāṇi yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhavyāni buddhvā ca vivarjitavyāni?
S06psp_4u:1341: prajñāpāramitāpratirūpakāni subhūte mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:1343: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhavyāni buddhvā ca vivarjayitavyāni.
S06psp_4u:1344: punar aparaṃ subhūte adhyātmaśūnyatāpratirūpakāṇi yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpratirūpakāṇi mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1346: tāni buddhvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇi vivarjayitavyāni. evañ ca vakṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1347: etān paryavāpnuhi etān paryavāpya ihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpnuhi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpnuhi,
S06psp_4u:1348_0: imāny eva tvaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvaya samyakprahāṇāni bhāvaya ṛddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
S06psp_4u:1350_0: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām udgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ yāvan manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1350_1: bhāvyamānāyāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi upasaṃhariṣyati. iti prativarṇikopasaṃhāraḥ
S06psp_4u:1351: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1352: suvarṇavarṇakāyena vyāmaprabhāṃ kṛtvā tatra bodhisattvas taṃ dṛṣṭvā spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyati,
S06psp_4u:1354: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
S06psp_4u:1355: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1357: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca purato buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgham upadarśayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1359: aham apy anāgate 'dhvany evaṃrūpas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ syām,
S06psp_4u:1360: evaṃ ca bhikṣugaṇaṃ parikarṣeyaṃ yathā yaṃ tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati tathaivāham api dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:1361: sa tatra spṛhām utpādayiṣyati spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyati,
S06psp_4u:1363: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
S06psp_4u:1364: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1365: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anekāni bodhisattvaśatāni anekāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi upadarśayati,
S06psp_4u:1367: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1368: te bodhisattvās teṣāṃ māranirmitānām antike spṛhām utpādayiṣyanti spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyanti,
S06psp_4u:1370: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
S06psp_4u:1371: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1372: na hīha subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1373: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_4u:1375: na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:1376: na pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nāṣṭavimokṣā na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:1377: na sarvaśūnyatā na sarvasamādhayaḥ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:1378: na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1379: yatra ca subhūte na rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1380: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1381_0: na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na
S06psp_4u:1381_1: pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nāṣṭavimokṣā
S06psp_4u:1381_2: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na sarvaśūnyatā
S06psp_4u:1382: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1383: yatra na bodhir na tatra buddho na bodhisattvā na śrāvakāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:1386: punar aparaṃ subhūte bahvantarāyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1387: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāni jāmbūdvīpakāni ratnāni,
S06psp_4u:1388_1: bhaviṣyanti. evam etat subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1388_3: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyāṃ bahavo 'ntarāyā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_4u:1390: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
S06psp_4u:1393: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti. alpabuddhayas te bhagavan mohapuruṣā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1394: mandabuddhayo ye 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti. na teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhiḥ prakramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1395: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitān na likhiṣyanti likhyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti bhāvyamānāyāñ cāntarāyaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:1397_0: evam etat subhūte evam etat mārādhiṣṭhitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_4u:1398: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1400: alpabuddhikās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca mandabuddhikāḥ parīttabuddhikā,
S06psp_4u:1401: na ca teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ kramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1403: likhiṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1404: anyeṣāñ ca likhatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1405: kiñ cāpi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām imāni mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1406: sacet punaḥ subhūte yad imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca likhatāṃ svādhyāyatām uddiśatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatāṃ mārakarmāṇi notpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1410_1: balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmān yāvat sarvajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:1410_2: veditavyam idaṃ subhūte buddhānubhāva eṣa yenaiṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca
S06psp_4u:1410_3: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ
S06psp_4u:1412: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān sarvasamādhīn sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvavimokṣamukhāni paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1413: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ pañcābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1415: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1416: sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti. ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_4u:1417: te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kṛtaśa udyogam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1418: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ,
S06psp_4u:1419_0: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu avinivartanīyā bodhisattvās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:1419_1: ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo
S06psp_4u:1420: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyāḥ kasyāścid eva bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:1422: viṃśatir vā triṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā pañcāśad vā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:1423: te 'syā mātur glānāyāḥ sarve 'py udyogam āpadyeran,
S06psp_4u:1424: kim ity asmākaṃ mātur antarāyo na bhavet,
S06psp_4u:1425: kim ity asmākaṃ mātā ciraṃ jīvet,
S06psp_4u:1426: kim ity asmākaṃ mātuḥ śarīre amanaāpaḥ sparśo na nipated,
S06psp_4u:1427: eṣāsmākaṃ jananī śarīrasya dātrī jīvitasya dhātrī,
S06psp_4u:1428: te tāṃ mātaram upasthitām upatiṣṭheran sugopitāṃ gopāyeyur,
S06psp_4u:1429: mā bhūd asyā jīvitāntarāyo vā śarīradaurbalyaṃ vā daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpopanipāto vā śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādi duṣkhaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:1430: evan te putrās tasyā mātuḥ sarvasukhopadhānāny upasaṃhareyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:1431: evan te tāṃ mātaraṃ sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyur mimīyur eṣāsmākam asya lokasya darśayitrī. evam eva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06psp_4u:1432: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1433: eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāsmākaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ jananī jñānālokasya kārikā,
S06psp_4u:1434: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:1435: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1436: eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā jananī tathāgatānām,
S06psp_4u:1438: tena tathāgatāḥ kṛtajñatām upādāya ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:1440: ato nirjātā hi tathāgatānām adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:1441: ato nirjātāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06psp_4u:1444: ato nirjātāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo,
S06psp_4u:1447: ato nirjātāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_4u:1453: ato nirjātās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi kecit subhūte (PSP_4:58)
S06psp_4u:1454: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06psp_4u:1455: sarve te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ abhisaṃbudhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06psp_4u:1456_0: ye 'pi te subhūte mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
S06psp_4u:1456_1: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti
S06psp_4u:1456_2: yoniśo manasikariṣyanti sarve te tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair buddhacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:1456_3: satatasamitaṃ samanvāhriyante teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ
S06psp_4u:1456_4: ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaṃ guptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti
S06psp_4u:1457: iti jāmbūdvīpakamahāratnodāharaṇādidṛṣṭāntena mahānubhāvatvam ity uktā doṣāḥ
S06psp_4u:1460: prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī ti. kathaṃ ca bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā janayitrī?
S06psp_4u:1461: kathañ ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitāsya lokasya darśayitrī?
S06psp_4u:1462: kathañ ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato janitaḥ?
S06psp_4u:1465: anayā subhūte gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā daśatathāgatabalāni janitāni,
S06psp_4u:1466: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā mahāmaitrī mahāmuditā mahopekṣā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvat sarvākārajñatā janitā,
S06psp_4u:1467: ebhiś ca subhūte dharmais tathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06psp_4u:1468: tasmāt tarhi subhūte anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato janitaḥ. iti tathāgatanirvṛttijñānam
S06psp_4u:1470: katamaḥ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena loka ity ākhyātaḥ?
S06psp_4u:1472: pañca subhūte skandhās tathāgatena loka ākhyātaḥ.
S06psp_4u:1474: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ?
S06psp_4u:1476: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā imān pañca skandhān lujyamānān darśayati,
S06psp_4u:1482: nāyūhaṃ na niryūhaṃ nātītān nānāgatān na pratyutpannān dharmān darśayati. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1483: na hi śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā,

S06psp_4u:1618: yāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ tathatā sā caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ tathatā,

S06psp_4u:1620: yā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ tathatā sā ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ tathatā,

S06psp_4u:1622: yā sarvasamādhīnāṃ tathatā sā sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ tathatā,

S06psp_4u:1628: yāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā sā sarvajñatāyās tathatā,

S06psp_4u:1661_0: atha khalu yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrās

S06psp_4u:1689: iti vaded, api nu sa samyag vadamāno vadet.

S06psp_4u:1698: gambhīrāṇi bhagavann imāni lakṣaṇāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāni yeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānām abhisaṃbuddhatvāt,

S06psp_4u:1700: prajñāpāramitāsaṃprakāśanatayā bhagavaṃs tāni lakṣaṇāni saṃprakāśitāni. āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad gambhīreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ gocaro,
S06psp_4u:1701: yatra carato tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,

S06psp_4u:1705: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:1722: sā tathāgatenālakṣaṇety abhisaṃbuddhā. avikopanalakṣaṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayas (PSP_4:70)

S06psp_4u:2097: dhyānapāramitayā parigṛhīto vīryapāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ kṣāntipāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ śīlapāramitayā (PSP_4:88)
S06psp_4u:2100: veditavyam etad subhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādam āpatsyate,
S06psp_4u:2101: yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā akṣato 'nupahato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. ity ādhāraviśeṣeṇa mārge prathamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
S06psp_4u:2102: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sāmudrikā naur anavabaddhānākoṭitā akoṭīkṛtā udake 'vatāritā bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2103: veditavyam etat subhūte iyaṃ naur antarā saṃsatsyate vyasanam āpatsyate,
S06psp_4u:2104_0: anyena bhāṇḍaṃ bhaviṣyati anyena naur bhaviṣyati. evaṃ sa vaṇig anupāyakuśalo veditavyo
S06psp_4u:2104_1: mahatānayena saṃyokṣyate mahatā ratnena bahiṣkṛto bhaviṣyati. evam eva kiṃ cāpi subhūte
S06psp_4u:2104_2: bodhisattvānām asti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti
S06psp_4u:2104_3: rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S06psp_4u:2105_0: te ca prajñāpāramitayāparigṛhītā upāyakauśalena cāparigṛhītā dhyānapāramitayāparigṛhītā
S06psp_4u:2106: sarvaśūnyatābhir aparigṛhītāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyair dharmair aparigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_4u:2117: veditavyam etat subhūte amī bodhisattvā antarā vyadhvani vyasanam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:2120_0: kiṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvānām antarā vyasanaṃ yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir
S06psp_4u:2120_1: vā. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātikaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāyāṃ nāvi svākoṭitāyām
S06psp_4u:2121: veditavyam etat subhūte neyaṃ sāmudrikā naur antarā vyasanam āpatsyate,
S06psp_4u:2122: gamiṣyaty eṣā taṃ pradeśaṃ yatrānayā gantavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2123: laukikānāñ ca ratnānāṃ sa vaṇig lābhī bhaviṣyati. evam eva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty (PSP_4:89)
S06psp_4u:2124: adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:2125: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2126: dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā dānapāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2127: sarvaśūnyatābhiḥ sarvabodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2132: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2134: veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyasanam āpatsyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2135_0: evam eva subhūte bhavati yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir
S06psp_4u:2135_1: asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti
S06psp_4u:2136: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīto bhavaty upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2137: dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā dānapāramitayā parigṛhīto bhavati. evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatayā parigṛhīto bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2138: sa ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ patati.
S06psp_4u:2140: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo viṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakas tasya kaścid eva śarīre vyādhir utpadyeta vātiko vā paittiko vā śleṣmiko vā sāṃnipātiko vā,
S06psp_4u:2142: subhūte api nu sa puruṣo muktakaḥ śaktaḥ svayam utkrāntum.
S06psp_4u:2146: kaścit punaḥ subhūte sa puruṣa uttiṣṭhet?
S06psp_4u:2148: kiṃ cāpi bhagavan sa puruṣo mañcād uttiṣṭhed,
S06psp_4u:2149: atha ca punar apratibalaḥ krośāntaṃ vā prakramituṃ sa tayā jarayā taiś ca vyādhibhiḥ kṣapitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2154_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti
S06psp_4u:2154_1: prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:2162: veditavyam etat subhūte 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2163_0: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitayā aparīgṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhīto yāvat sarvākārajñatayāparigṛhītaḥ.
S06psp_4u:2163_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo viṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2164: sa vātena vā pittena vā śleṣmanā vā sāṃnipātena vā parikṣapitas,
S06psp_4u:2165: taṃ mañcād utsthāpya dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ pārśvayor abalaṃ vyānuparigṛhya evaṃ vadetām:
S06psp_4u:2166_0: āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenecchasi yena kāmo 'nuparigṛhītas tvam āvābhyāṃ nāntarā
S06psp_4u:2166_1: patiṣyasi yāvan na tat sthānam anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi. evam eva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya
S06psp_4u:2166_2: mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir
S06psp_4u:2166_3: asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:2167: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto,
S06psp_4u:2174: veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā saṃsatsyate,
S06psp_4u:2175: pratibalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tat sthānam anuprāptuṃ yad utānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2179: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāparigṛhītāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalena cāparigṛhītāḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca patanti?
S06psp_4u:2181: sādhu sādhu subhūte yas tvaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etam arthaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase,
S06psp_4u:2182: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādita eva yad dānan dadāti tad ahaṃkāramamakārapatitayā saṃtatyā dadāti,
S06psp_4u:2189: tasya tad dānan dadata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2206: sa tena dānena manyate tad dānaṃ manyate dānaṃ mameti manyate,
S06psp_4u:2208: tayā prajñayā manyate tāṃ prajñāṃ manyate prajñāṃ mameti manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2209: na hi dānapāramitāyā ete vikalpāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2211: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na hi prajñāpāramitāyā ete vikalpāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2213: sa ca bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo nāraṃ jānāti na pāraṃ jānāti,
S06psp_4u:2214_0: so 'parigṛhīto dānapāramitayā śīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā dhyānapāramitayā
S06psp_4u:2214_1: prajñāpāramitayāparigṛhīto yāvat sarvākārajñatayāparigṛhītaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati,
S06psp_4u:2215: na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām. kathañ ca bodhisattvo 'nupāyakuśalo bhavati?
S06psp_4u:2216: iha subhūte yo bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ādāv evam anupāyena dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:2235: sa dānaṃ manyate dānena manyate dānaṃ mameti manyate,
S06psp_4u:2236: śīlaṃ manyate śīlena manyate śīlavān aham iti manyate,
S06psp_4u:2237: kṣāntiṃ manyate kṣāntyā manyate kṣamāvān aham iti manyate,
S06psp_4u:2238: vīryaṃ manyate vīryeṇa manyate vīryaṃ mameti manyate,
S06psp_4u:2239: dhyānaṃ manyate dhyānena manyate dhyānavān aham iti manyate,
S06psp_4u:2240: prajñāṃ manyate prajñayā manyate prajñā mameti manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2241: na hi dānapāramitāyāṃ vikalpaḥ saṃvidyate yathāsau vikalpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2242: tathā hy āramitaiṣā yad uta dānapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:2246: āramitaiṣā yad uta dhyānapāramitā. na hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vikalpaḥ saṃvidyate yathāsau vikalpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2247: tathā hy āramitaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:2248: sa ca bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro nāraṃ jānāti na pāraṃ jānāti,
S06psp_4u:2249: so 'parigṛhīto dānapāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ śīlapāramitayāparigṛhītaḥ kṣāntipāramitayāparigṛhīto vīryapāramitayāparigṛhīto dhyānapāramitayāparigṛhītaḥ prajñāpāramitayāparigṛhīta,
S06psp_4u:2250: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatayā śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati,
S06psp_4u:2251_0: na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā copāyakauśalena
S06psp_4u:2251_1: cāparigṛhītaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. kathaṃ ca subhūte
S06psp_4u:2251_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā copāyakauśalena ca parigṛhīto na śrāvakabhūmiṃ
S06psp_4u:2253: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādāv eva dānaṃ dadan,
S06psp_4u:2261: ahaṃ dānan dadāmīdan dānan dadāmy asyai dānaṃ dadāmi,
S06psp_4u:2278: sa dānaṃ na manyate dānena na manyate dānaṃ mameti na manyate,
S06psp_4u:2279: śīlaṃ na manyate śīlena na manyate śīlaṃ mameti na manyate,
S06psp_4u:2280: kṣāntiṃ na manyate kṣāntyā na manyate kṣāntiṃ mameti na manyate,
S06psp_4u:2281: vīryaṃ na manyate vīryeṇa na manyate vīryaṃ mameti na manyate,
S06psp_4u:2282: dhyānaṃ na manyate dhyānena na manyate dhyānaṃ mameti na manyate,
S06psp_4u:2283: prajñāṃ na manyate prajñayā na manyate prajñā mameti na manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2284: tathā hi dānapāramitāyāṃ vikalpo na saṃvidyate yena manyate,
S06psp_4u:2285: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyāṃ vikalpo na saṃvidyate yena manyate,
S06psp_4u:2286: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vikalpo na saṃvidyate yena manyate,
S06psp_4u:2288: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā āramitaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:2289: sa ca bodhisattvo mahāsattva āramitāñ ca pāramitāñ ca na manyate,
S06psp_4u:2293: yāvat sarvākārajñatayā parigṛhīto na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
S06psp_4u:2294_0: sarvākārajñatāṃ cārāgayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
S06psp_4u:2294_1: parigṛhīta upāyakauśalena ca parigṛhīto na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ
S06psp_4u:2296: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:2297: kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ?
S06psp_4u:2305: iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:94)
S06psp_4u:2306: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni,
S06psp_4u:2308: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā uddeṣṭāraḥ,
S06psp_4u:2310: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yadyad eva dānan dadāsi tattat sarvam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmaya,
S06psp_4u:2311: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yadyad eva śīlaṃ rakṣasi,
S06psp_4u:2317: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2318: mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārato mā vijñānataḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2319: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin dānapāramitayā parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2320: mā śīlapāramitayā mā kṣāntipāramitayā mā vīryapāramitayā mā dhyānapāramitayā,
S06psp_4u:2322: mā adhyātmaśūnyatayā mā bahirdhāśūnyatayā mā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2327: mā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ mā āryasatyair mā aṣṭābhir vimokṣair mā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:2329: mā samādhibhir mā dhāraṇīmukhair mā daśabhis tathāgatabalair mā caturbhir vaiṣāradyair mā catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir mā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2330: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ parāmrākṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2331: aparāmṛṣṭaṃ hi rūpam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_4u:2334: aparāmṛṣṭā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:2346: aparāmṛṣṭā yāvat sarvākārajñatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyati. mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2349: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra vijñāne spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2351: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2360: mā aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2363: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra sarvākārajñatāyāṃ spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2365: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra srotaāpattiphale spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2366: mā sakṛdāgāmiphale mā anāgāmiphale mā arhattve mā pratyekabodhau spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:2368: mānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2369: svabhāvaśūnyā hi kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ. ity anāsvādanāviśeṣeṇa mārge caturthaḥ kṣaṇaḥ iti viśeṣalakṣaṇam
S06psp_4u:2371: duṣkarakārakā hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
S06psp_4u:2372: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ.
S06psp_4u:2376: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā (PSP_4:96)
S06psp_4u:2378: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā lokasya sukhāya,
S06psp_4u:2379: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā lokasya trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāma ity anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ. lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmo,
S06psp_4u:2380_0: lokasya layanaṃ lokasya parāyaṇaṃ lokasya dvīpā lokasya pariṇāyakā anukampakā nāthā
S06psp_4u:2380_1: lokasya gatir bhaviṣyāma iti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ. kathañ ca
S06psp_4u:2380_2: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ lokasya hitāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti?
S06psp_4u:2381_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvān pañcabhyo gatibhyaḥ parimocyābhayasthale

S06psp_4u:2722_3: dhārayati vācayati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tathatvāya pratipadyate. ity anabhiniveśasvabhāvaḥ
S06psp_4u:2724_0: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:2724_1: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na cāsya
S06psp_4u:2725: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vyavacārayitavyā?
S06psp_4u:2727: sarvākārajñatā nimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vyavacārayitavyā.
S06psp_4u:2729: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvākārajñatā nimnayā saṃtatyā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati?
S06psp_4u:2731: śūnyatānimnayā śūnyatāpravaṇayā śūnyatāprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2736: yāvad bhūtakoṭinimnayā bhūtakoṭipravaṇayā bhūtakoṭiprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā,
S06psp_4u:2737_1: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati. svapnanimnayā nirmāṇanimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā,
S06psp_4u:2740: pratibimbanimnayā gandharvanagaranimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati.
S06psp_4u:2743_0: śūnyatānimnayā śūnyatāpravaṇayā śūnyatāprāgbhārayā saṃtatyā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:2743_3: pravaṇayā prāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām iha gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:2743_4: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati. kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_4u:2751: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvat sarvākārajñatām api vyavacārayati?
S06psp_4u:2753: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ vyavacārayati,
S06psp_4u:2754: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ vyavacārayati,
S06psp_4u:2761: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ vyavacārayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2762: tathā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā na kenacit kṛtā na kutaścid āgatā na kvacid gatā nāpi kvacit sthitā na deśasthā na pradeśasthā na tasyāḥ saṃkhyā upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:2764: yasyāś ca na saṃkhyā na gamanaṃ nāgamanam upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:2766: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārair na vijñānena na skandhair na dhātubhir nāyatanair na pratītyasamutpādena na pratītyasamutpādāṅgair,
S06psp_4u:2767: na dānena na śīlena na kṣāntyā na vīryeṇa na dhyānena na prajñayā yāvan na sarvākārajñatā jñānenābhisaṃboddhum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2770: vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2771: tathā hi subhūte yā ca rūpasya tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2773: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:2776: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2779: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2782: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca pāramitātathatā,
S06psp_4u:2792: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:2793_0: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā divyāni candanacūrṇāni gṛhītvā divyāny
S06psp_4u:2794: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tiṣṭhan,
S06psp_4u:2795: ekānte sthitāś ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:2796_0: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhātarkātarkāvacarā śāntā śūkṣmā
S06psp_4u:2796_1: nipuṇapaṇḍitavijñavedanīyā sarvalokavipratyanīkā yad uta tathāgatānāṃ bodhir yatra
S06psp_4u:2797: evaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām evaṃ nipuṇāṃ nirdiśanti,
S06psp_4u:2800: vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2802: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2807: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:2810: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca yāvad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2811: yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:2812: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacārān rūpāvacārāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:2814: rūpam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2816: vijñānam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2817: yā ca rūpasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2818: yā ca vedanāyās tathatā yā ca saṃjñāyās tathatā yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2819: yā ca vijñānasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:2821: yā ca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. dānapāramitaiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva (PSP_4:116)
S06psp_4u:2824: prajñāpāramitaiva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2826: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:2828: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. adhyātmaśūnyataiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:2829: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyataiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2831: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. smṛtyupasthānāny eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva smṛtyupasthānāi,
S06psp_4u:2832: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2833: yā ca smṛtyupasthānatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2834: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2835_0: yā cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattitathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayāadvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:2836: āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2838: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhā,
S06psp_4u:2839: buddhā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva buddhāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2841_0: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. idam api devaputrā
S06psp_4u:2841_1: arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgato 'lpotsukatāyāṃ cittaṃ nāmayāmāsa na dharmadeśanāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2843: dharmo durdṛśo duranubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ śāntaḥ śūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīko yad uteyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ bodhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:2844_0: sā na kenacid abhisaṃbuddhā na kadācid abhisaṃbuddhā na kvacid abhisaṃbuddhā iyaṃ
S06psp_4u:2844_1: sā dharmāṇāṃ gambhīratā dharmatā yatra na dvayasamudācāro nādvayasamudācāraḥ saṃvidyate.
S06psp_4u:2846: tathatāgambhīratayā dharmadhātugambhīratayā bhūtakoṭīgambhīratayā acintyadharmadhātugambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2848_1: devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ. rūpagambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2850: skandhagambhīratayā dhātugambhīratayāyatanagambhīratayā pratītyasamutpādagambhīratayā pratītyasamutpādāṅgagambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2852: śīlapāramitāgambhīratayā kṣāntipāramitāgambhīratayā vīryapāramitāgambhīratayā dhyānapāramitāgambhīratayā prajñāpāramitāgambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2853: adhyātmaśūnyatāgambhīratayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāgambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2858: evam ukte devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:2859: sarvalokavipratyanīko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2860: nāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo rūpasyodgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate,
S06psp_4u:2861: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:2862: na vijñānasyodgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate, na (PSP_4:118)
S06psp_4u:2863_1: vā deśyate. evaṃ na sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipkṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām
S06psp_4u:2863_2: udgrahāya vā nānudgrahāya vā dharma upadeśyate,
S06psp_4u:2864: na sarvadharmāṇām udgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā dharmo deśyate,
S06psp_4u:2865_0: nāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya udgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate. evaṃ
S06psp_4u:2865_1: na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya nānāgāmiphalasya nārhattvasya na pratyekabodher yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_4u:2866: udgrahe ca lokaś carati mama rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2867: mama vedanā mama saṃjñā mama saṃskārā mama vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2868: mama skandhā mama dhātavo mamāyatanāni mama pratītyasamutpādo 'haṃ pratītyasamutpannaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2869: mama dānam ahaṃ dānapatir mama śīlam ahaṃ śīlavān mama kṣāntir ahaṃ kṣāntimān mama vīryam ahaṃ vīryavān mama dhyānam ahaṃ dhyānavān mama prajñā ahaṃ prajñāvān,
S06psp_4u:2870: mamādhyātmaśūnyatā aham adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayāmi yāvan mamābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāham abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06psp_4u:2871_1: mamāryasatyāni mamābhijñā mama vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni mama śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni
S06psp_4u:2871_3: mama srotaāpattiphalam ahaṃ srotaāpanno mama sakṛdāgāmiphalam ahaṃ sakṛdāgāmī mamānāgāmiphalam
S06psp_4u:2871_4: aham anāgāmī mamārhattvam aham arhan mama pratyekabodhir ahaṃ pratyekabuddho mama
S06psp_4u:2874: nāyaṃ devaputrā dharmo rūpasyodgrahāya deśyate nānudgrahāya,
S06psp_4u:2875: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:2876: na vijñānasyodgrahāya deśyate nānudgrahāya. ye tu devaputrā rūpasyodgrahāya caranti,
S06psp_4u:2879: na te bhavyāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayitum. ye skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānām udgrahāya caranti,
S06psp_4u:2884: na te bhavyāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayituṃ yāvan na pratibalā dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitāṃ bhāvayituṃ,
S06psp_4u:2885: yāvan na pratibalāḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayitum. iti sarvalokavipratyanīkasvabhāvaḥ
S06psp_4u:2890: yāvad dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2899: sarvākārajñatānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ. nāyaṃ dharmaḥ kvacit pratihanyate rūpe na pratihanyate,
S06psp_4u:2900: evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na pratihanyate,
S06psp_4u:2906: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na pratihanyate. apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2931: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:2932: anujāto 'yaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2933: tathā hi yadyad eva deśayati sarvatac chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_4u:2934: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_4u:2937: kim ity anujātatvāt subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'nujātas tathāgatasya?
S06psp_4u:2940: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatasyānujātaḥ. yā tathāgatasya tathatā sā sarvadharmatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2941: yā sarvadharmatathatā sā tathāgatatathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2942: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yā tathāgatatathatā sā sthititathatā yā sthititathatā sā tathāgatatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2943: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatāvikārā nirvikārā,
S06psp_4u:2944_0: evaṃ hi subhūteḥ sthavirasya tathatāvikārā nirvikārā yathā tathāgatasya tathatā na
S06psp_4u:2944_1: kvacit pratihanyate. evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā na kvacit pratihanyate. yā ca tathāgatatathatā
S06psp_4u:2945: ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā na sā kadācin na tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2946: yataḥ sā na kadācin na tathatā tataḥ sā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatā sarvatragāvikalpā nirvikalpā,
S06psp_4u:2947: evaṃ hi subhūtitathatā sarvatragāvikalpā nirvikalpā. yathā tathāgatatathatā abhinnā abhedatathatānupalabhyā,
S06psp_4u:2948: evaṃ subhūtitathatā abhinnā abhedatathatānupalabhyā. evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatānanyatathatā sarvadharmatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2949: yā na sā kadācin na tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2950: sadā sā tathatā tathaiva subhūtisthaviro 'nanyatathatā yā tathāgatam anujāto na kvacid anujātaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2951: evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06psp_4u:2952: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā. evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviratathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06psp_4u:2953: evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviras tathāgatam anujāta iti ucyate. atītatathatāsamatayā tathāgatatathatāsamatātathāgatatathatāsamatayātītatathatāsamatā,
S06psp_4u:2955_1: iti hy atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
