S06psp_4u:3132: tathā svabhisaṃbodhā bhagavann anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3133: tathā hi bhagavan na kaścid abhisaṃbudhyate na kenacid abhisaṃbudhyate na kiñcid abhisaṃboddhavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3135: śūnyeṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu sa dharmo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:3136: yo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena vābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ vābhisaṃbudhyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3138: yasyāpi dharmasya vṛddhaye vā prahāṇāya vā dānaṃ vā dadyāt,
S06psp_4u:3139: śīlaṃ vā rakṣet kṣāntiṃ vā saṃpādayet vīryaṃ vā ārabheta dhyānaṃ vā samāpadyeta,
S06psp_4u:3142_0: yaś cābhisaṃbudhyeta yena cābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ cābhisaṃbudhyeta sarve te dharmāḥ
S06psp_4u:3142_1: śūnyāḥ. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa svabhisaṃbodhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anuttarā
S06psp_4u:3143: tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3153: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3154: anenāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3155: tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3156: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. evam evāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3157: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3160: atha ca punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva ākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3161_0: sacet punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucya svabhisaṃbodhā
S06psp_4u:3161_1: syād anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir na durabhisaṃbhavā na tv evaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā
S06psp_4u:3161_2: vivarterann anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher. anenāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa vijñāyate
S06psp_4u:3163: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3174_0: evaṃ vistareṇa skandhadhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni
S06psp_4u:3181: āyuṣman śāriputrānyatra rūpāt sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3187: śāriputrānyatra vijñānāt sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3190: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, (PSP_4:132)
S06psp_4u:3191: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ yāvad anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3196: śāriputra yā rūpasya tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_4u:3198_0: yā vijñānasya tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ vistareṇa skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ
S06psp_4u:3199: yā āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_4u:3200: yāvat yā sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3205: śāriputrānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_4u:3208: śāriputrānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ vistareṇānyatra skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādatathatāyā,
S06psp_4u:3214: anyatra sarvākārajñatātathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3223: evaṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭīḥ.
S06psp_4u:3233: āyuṣman śāriputrānyatra tathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ dharmatāyā dharmadhātor dharmasthititāyā dharmaniyāmatāyā bhūtakoṭeḥ,
S06psp_4u:3234: anyatrācintyadhātoḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3238: evaṃ satyataḥ sthititas teṣu dharmeṣv anupalambhamāneṣu,
S06psp_4u:3239: katamaḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
S06psp_4u:3240: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3242: tayā na kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartiṣyate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. ya ime trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ tathāgatenākhyātāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3243: eṣāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ na bhaviṣyati. eka eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati yad uta bodhisattvayāniko yathāyuṣmataḥ subhūter nirdeśaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3244: atha khalv āyuṣmān Pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3245: kiṃ punar āyuṣman śāriputra subhūtiḥ sthavira ekam api bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam icchati,
S06psp_4u:3247: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3248: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte ekam api bodhisattvayānikaṃ bodhisattvam icchasi?
S06psp_4u:3249: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: (PSP_4:134)
S06psp_4u:3250: kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ chāriputra tathatāyāṃ trīn bodhisattvān icchasi,
S06psp_4u:3251: śrāvakayānikaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvayānikaṃ vā bodhisattvam icchasi?
S06psp_4u:3255: tat kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ śāriputra tathatāyāṃ trayo bodhisattvā upalabhyante?
S06psp_4u:3259: kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ chāriputra tathatā ekato vā dvābhyāṃ vā tribhir vākārair upalabhyate?
S06psp_4u:3263: kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ śāriputra tathatāyām ekaṃ bodhisattvam upalabhate?
S06psp_4u:3267: evaṃ satyataḥ sthititas te dharmā anupalabhyamānāḥ kutaḥ punar āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3268: ayaṃ śrāvakayāniko bodhisattvo 'yaṃ pratyekabuddhayāniko bodhisattvo 'yaṃ buddhayāniko bodhisattva ity,
S06psp_4u:3269_0: ayaṃ sarvadharmatathatāyāṃ prabhāvyamānāyāṃ yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittan
S06psp_4u:3269_1: nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati
S06psp_4u:3269_2: na saṃtrāsam āpadyate. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niryāsyaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_4u:3270: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_4u:3271: sādhu sādhu subhūte pratibhāntu te subhūte yathāpīdaṃ buddhānubhāvena,
S06psp_4u:3272_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmatathatāyāṃ prabhāvyamānāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3272_1: yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī
S06psp_4u:3272_2: bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3274: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3275: katamayā bhagavan bodhyā niryāsyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3277: anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā niryāsyaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. iti madhyāni mokṣabhāgīyānīty uktaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
S06psp_4u:3279: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3280: niryātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kathaṃ sthātavyam?
S06psp_4u:3282: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena sattvānām antike samacittatāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3299: sarvasattvā na viheṭhanācittenālambitavyāḥ. iti madhyam uṣmagatam
S06psp_4u:3300_0: sarvasattvānām antike mātṛcittam utpādayitavyaṃ pitṛcittam utpādayitavyaṃ bhrātṛcittam
S06psp_4u:3300_1: utpādayitavyaṃ bhaginīcittam utpādayitavyaṃ putracittam utpādayitavyaṃ duhitṛcittam
S06psp_4u:3300_2: utpādayitavyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitacittam utpādayitavyaṃ sarvasattvāś ca mātṛcittena
S06psp_4u:3303: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitacittenālambitavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryāntukāmena sthātavyam.
S06psp_4u:3305: ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativiratena bhavitavyaṃ pare ca prāṇātipātavairamaṇo samādāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3308: teṣāñ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryāstukāmena sthātavyam.
S06psp_4u:3318: ye cānye kāmamithyācārāt prativiratā bhavanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
S06psp_4u:3319: evam anṛtavacanāt paruṣavacanāt piśunavacanād avadyapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt,
S06psp_4u:3330: evam ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3333: pare ca caturthe dhyāne samādāpayitavyāś caturthadhyānasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3339: ye cānye maitrīvihāriṇas teṣām api varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
S06psp_4u:3354: pare ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau samādāpayitavyāḥ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3356: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena. iti mṛdumūrdhagatam
S06psp_4u:3367: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena. iti madhyamūrdhagatam
S06psp_4u:3373: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad ātmanā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_4u:3377: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā n bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
S06psp_4u:3381: ye cānye sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_4u:3387: ye cānye sattvā āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayanti,
S06psp_4u:3398: ye cānye sattvāś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_4u:3426: ātmanā ca mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā ca paripūrayitavyā,
S06psp_4u:3427: pare ca mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca samādāpayitavyā,
S06psp_4u:3429: ye cānye mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca paripūrayanti, (PSP_4:139)
S06psp_4u:3436: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena sthātavyam. ity adhimātramūrdhagatam
S06psp_4u:3437: ātmanā ca duṣkhaṃ parijānāti samudayaṃ ca prajahāti nirodhaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti mārgañ ca bhāvayati,
S06psp_4u:3438: parāṃś ca duṣkhaparijñāyai samudayaprahāṇāya nirodhasākṣātkriyāyai mārgabhāvanāyai samādāpayati,
S06psp_4u:3439: duḥkhaparijñānasya samudayaprahāṇasya nirodhasākṣātkriyāyā mārgabhāvanāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_4u:3440: ye cānye duḥkhaṃ prajānanti samudayaṃ prajahati nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvanti mārgaṃ ca bhāvayanti,

S06psp_4u:3442: ātmanā ca srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_4u:3447: evam ātmanā ca sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_4u:3448: ātmanā cānāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti.
S06psp_4u:3449: ātmanā cārhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_4u:3454: ātmanā ca pratyekabuddhaphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca pratyekabuddhaphalajñānasākṣātkriyāṃ sākṣātkaroti,

S06psp_4u:3465: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena sthātavyam. ity adhimātrā kṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3475: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti mṛdavo 'gradharmāḥ
S06psp_4u:3477: parāṃś ca bodhisattvābhijñāsu samādāpayati bodhisattvābhijñānāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_4u:3479: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti madhyāgradharmāḥ
S06psp_4u:3498: saddharmasthiteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye cānye saddharmasthitiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_4u:3499: teṣāñ ca mahāpuruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3500_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena
S06psp_4u:3500_1: bhavitavyam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalye
S06psp_4u:3501: anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati anāvaraṇā vedanā anāvaraṇā saṃjñā anāvaraṇāḥ saṃskārā,
S06psp_4u:3503: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvad anāvaraṇā saddharmasthitir bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3504: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataś caivaṃ rūpan na parigṛhītaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3505: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_4u:3507: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā na parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3508: tathā hi subhūte yo rūpasyāparigraho na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3510_0: tathā hi yo vijñānasyāparigraho na tad vijñānam. evaṃ yāvad yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_4u:3510_1: aparigraho na sā sarvākārajñatā. asmin khalu punar bodhisattvasthāne bhāṣyamāṇe dvayor
S06psp_4u:3510_2: bodhisattvasahasrayor anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt. ity adhimātrāgradharmāḥ
S06psp_4u:3511: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3512: avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ka ākārāḥ?
S06psp_4u:3517: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3518_0: yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanabhūmir yā ca śrāvakabhūmir yā ca pratyekabuddhabhūmir yā
S06psp_4u:3518_1: ca bodhisattvabhūmir yā ca tathāgatabhūmir uktā sarvā sā tathatayāvikalpā nirvikalpādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:3519: yathā ca sā tathatāvikalpā tathaiva na vikalpayaty,
S06psp_4u:3521: evam avatīrṇo yathā tathatā tathā śrutvā tato 'tikramya na kiñcid vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:3522: na hi tās tathatāyā ekaikato nobhayato nānubhayato,
S06psp_4u:3523: na ca yatkiñcitpralāpī bhavati. arthopasaṃhitāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate nānarthopasaṃhitāṃ,
S06psp_4u:3524: na ca parasya ca kṛtākṛtaṃ vyavalokayati,
S06psp_4u:3526: subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti sāmānyenāvaivartikalakṣaṇam
S06psp_4u:3533: anākārā hi subhūte sarvadharmā aliṅgā ānimittāḥ.
S06psp_4u:3534: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3535: yadi bhagavann anākārāḥ sarvadharmā aliṅgā ānimittāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3536: katamair bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'vinivartanīya iti nirdṛśyate?

S06psp_4u:3540_1: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ skandhebhyo vinivṛtto dhātubhyo vinivṛtta āyatanebhyo
S06psp_4u:3540_3: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ. yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:3541: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vinivṛttaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3550: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3551: tathā hi subhūte rūpasya svabhāvo na saṃvidyate. evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:3552: vijñānasya svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratiṣṭhet. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:3553: evaṃ yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratiṣṭhet. iti nirvedhāṅgasthitasyāvaivartikalakṣaṇam ekam
S06psp_4u:3555: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ito bahirdhānāṃ yeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ mukham ullokayati,
S06psp_4u:3556_0: ime bhagavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇājñeyaṃ jānanti dṛśyaṃ paśyanti samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prajñāṃ
S06psp_4u:3556_1: ca prajñāpayantīti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. na vicikitsām āpadyate na śīlavrataṃ parāmṛṣati na kudṛṣṭiṃ patati,
S06psp_4u:3558_0: nānyeṣāṃ devānāṃ namaskāraṃ karoti. puṣpair vā gandhair vā dhūpair vā vilepanair
S06psp_4u:3558_1: vā cūrṇair vā cīvarair vā cchatrair vā dhvajair vā patākābhir vā nānyeṣāṃ dātavyaṃ
S06psp_4u:3559: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3561: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3562_0: na narakeṣūpapadyate na yamaloke na tiryagyonyāṃ nāsureṣūpapadyate na pratyanteṣu
S06psp_4u:3562_1: janapadeṣūpapadyate na jaḍamūko bhavati na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate na ca strībhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_4u:3563: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3565: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate sa ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3570: evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt piśunavacanāt paruṣavacanād avadyapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādād,
S06psp_4u:3576: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3577: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi daśākuśalān karmapathānnādhyāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3578: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo (PSP_4:144)
S06psp_4u:3581: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā dānapāramitāyāṃ vartate,
S06psp_4u:3582: śīlapāramitāyāṃ vartate kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vartate vīryapāramitāyāṃ vartate dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vartate,
S06psp_4u:3585: evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_4u:3586: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3587_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yānyān dharmān paryavāpnoti
S06psp_4u:3587_1: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam itivṛttakaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśaṃ tattad dharmadānaṃ dadata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3588: sarvasattvānām anena dānena dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṅ gacchantu,
S06psp_4u:3589: sa tad dharmadānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_4u:3590: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3592: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kāṅkṣā nāsti vimatir nāsti vicikitsā.
S06psp_4u:3594: kena kāraṇena bhagavann avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kāṅkṣā nāsti vimatir nāsti vicikitsā?
S06psp_4u:3596_0: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati
S06psp_4u:3596_1: rūpaṃ vā vedanāṃ vā saṃjñāṃ vā saṃskārāṃ vā vijñānaṃ vā skandhān vā dhātūn vā āyatanāni
S06psp_4u:3596_2: vā pratītyasamutpādaṃ vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3597_0: sarvapāramitā vā sarvaśūnyatā vā sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān
S06psp_4u:3597_1: vā dharmān apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr vā āryasatyāni vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitā
S06psp_4u:3597_2: vā daśatathāgatabalāni vā vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido vā āveṇikān buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3599: yatra kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā syāt,
S06psp_4u:3600: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato (PSP_4:145)
S06psp_4u:3603_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ snigdhena kāyakarmaṇā
S06psp_4u:3603_1: manaāpena snigdhena vākkarmaṇā manaāpena snigdhena manaskarmaṇā manaāpena kāntena
S06psp_4u:3604: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3605_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satatasamitaṃ maitreṇa
S06psp_4u:3605_1: kāyakarmaṇā manaāpena maitreṇa vākkarmaṇā manaāpena maitreṇa manaskarmaṇā manaāpena
S06psp_4u:3606: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3608: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcabhir nivaraṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
S06psp_4u:3610: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3612: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarveṇa sarvam anuśayo nāsti,
S06psp_4u:3613: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3615: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā na bhrāntacitto 'tikrāmati vā pratikrāmati vā,
S06psp_4u:3616: so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā upasthitasmṛtir atikrāmati,
S06psp_4u:3617: upasthitasmṛtir eva pratikrāmati. smṛtimāṃś caiva gacchati ca kramati tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ ca kalpayati na sahasā bhūmau pādāv utkṣipati,
S06psp_4u:3618: na sahasā bhūmau pādau pratikṣipati na sahasā bhūmau pādau nikṣipati,
S06psp_4u:3619: smṛtimān eva sa pādau utkṣipati pratikṣipati nikṣipati,
S06psp_4u:3621: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo (PSP_4:146)
S06psp_4u:3624: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cīvaraparibhoge na kāyajugupsito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3625: na yūkilaś caukṣasamudācāraḥ śucisamudācāraḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lpābādhaś ca bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3626: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3628: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni tāni aśītikrimikulasahasrāṇi kāye prativasanti kāyaṃ bhakṣayanti,
S06psp_4u:3629: tāny avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ kāye na saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3630: tathā hi subhūte tāni kuśalamūlāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvalokābhyudgatāni,
S06psp_4u:3631: tena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāny aśītikrimikulasahasrāṇi kāye na saṃvidyante. yathāyathā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitāni kuśalamūlāni pravardhante,
S06psp_4u:3632: tathātathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyapariśuddhiñ ca vākpariśuddhiñ ca cittapariśuddhiṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_4u:3633: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3635: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3636: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyapariśuddhiś ca vākpariśuddhiś ca cittapariśuddhiś ca bhavati?
S06psp_4u:3638: yathāyathā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni pravardhante,
S06psp_4u:3639_0: tathātathā kāyacakratvaṃ vākcakratvaṃ cittacakratvaṃ ca kāyavākcittakauṭilyatāñ ca
S06psp_4u:3639_1: taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ pariśodhayati. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyapariśuddhiś
S06psp_4u:3640: sa tayā kāyapariśuddhyā vākpariśuddhyā cittapariśuddhyā ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ cātikrāmati. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_4:147)
S06psp_4u:3641: kāyapariśuddhiś ca vākpariśuddhiś ca cittapariśuddhiś ca,
S06psp_4u:3642: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3644: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na lābhasatkāraguruko bhavati na piṇḍapātaguruko bhavati yāvan na cīvaraguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3646: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3648_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na mātsaryacittam
S06psp_4u:3648_1: utpadyate na dauḥśīlyacittam utpadyate na kṣubdhacittam utpadyate na kausīdyacittam
S06psp_4u:3648_2: utpadyate nāsamāhitacittam utpadyate na dauṣprajñācittam utpadyate nerṣyācittam utpadyate
S06psp_4u:3648_3: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:3650: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthirabuddhiś ca bhavati satkṛtya ca parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_4u:3651: yat kiṃcit parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti tat sarvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃsyandayati yāni tāni laukikāni kṛtyāni tāni sarvāṇi prajñāpāramitām āgamya dharmatayā saṃsyandayati,
S06psp_4u:3653: yo dharmadhātau na yujyate sarvaṃ taṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujyamānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3656_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_4u:3656_1: aṣṭau mahānirayān purato 'bhinirmāya tatraikaikasmin mahāniraye bahūni bodhisattvaśatāni
S06psp_4u:3656_2: bahūni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_4u:3656_3: dahyamānāni pacyamānāni duḥkhī tīvrī kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhavamānāny (PSP_4:148)
S06psp_4u:3659: ime te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyās tathāgatair vyākṛtās teṣu mahānarakeṣūpapannās,
S06psp_4u:3660: tvam api nairayikas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
S06psp_4u:3662: punar eva tvam etad bodhicittaṃ pratiniḥsṛjya,
S06psp_4u:3665: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:3666: veditavyaṃ vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
S06psp_4u:3667_0: niyato 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaivartyadhātau sthānaṃ subhūte 'navakāśo yad
S06psp_4u:3667_1: avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo narake vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā asureṣu vā kāyeṣūpapadyate,
S06psp_4u:3669: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3671: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3676: evaṃ mayā vīryapāramitā pariśodhayitavyā evaṃ mayā dhyānapāramitā pariśodhayitavyā,
S06psp_4u:3678: evaṃ mayā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā,
S06psp_4u:3679_0: tat sarvaṃ pratideśaya yat tvayā pūrvam atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
S06psp_4u:3679_1: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat saddharmasthitir
S06psp_4u:3679_2: etasminn antare yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam anumoditan tat pratideśaya tan nisṛja,
S06psp_4u:3680: yad etat tvayā śrutaṃ naitad buddhavacanaṃ naitat samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitaṃ kavikṛtakaṃ kāvyam etat,
S06psp_4u:3681: yad ahaṃ bhāṣe etad buddhavacanam etat tathāgatena bhāṣitam.
S06psp_4u:3682: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣubhyati kāṅkṣati vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:3683: veditavyam evam eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyākṛtas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
S06psp_4u:3687: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kṣubhyati na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:3692: dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām aparapraṇeyaś ca bhavati yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:3693_0: tadyathāpi nāma arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur na parasya śraddhayā gacchati pratyakṣakārī
S06psp_4u:3693_1: dharmatāyām asaṃhāryo bhavati māreṇa pāpīyasā. evam eva subhūte 'navamardanīyo bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:3694: apratyudāvartanīyadharmā ca bhavati śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā buddhayānikair vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:3695: niyato 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyadhātau sthito 'parapraṇeyaś ca bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3696: sa tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāpi śraddhayā na gacchati,
S06psp_4u:3697: prāg eva śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā buddhayānikānāṃ vā prāg eva mārasya pāpīyasaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3698: prāg evānyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ vā śraddhayā gacchen naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3699: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3700: yasya śraddhayā gacched rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskārāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā,
S06psp_4u:3701: rūpatathatāyā vā vedanātathatāyā vā saṃjñātathatāyā vā saṃskāratathatāyā vā vijñānatathatāyā vā,
S06psp_4u:3702_3: anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathatān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3703: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3705: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣenāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3709: sa khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgapratirūpakam upadekṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3710: yo 'sau mārgapratirūpakaḥ saṃsārāvacarair laukikair ākārair yadi vāsti saṃjñā yadi vā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upadekṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3712: iyaṃ pratipad yena mārgeṇa yayā pratipadā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpsyasi,
S06psp_4u:3714: anenāyuṣman mārgeṇānayā pratipadā ihaiva tvaṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kuru,
S06psp_4u:3715: na tu tāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyasi,
S06psp_4u:3716: aho batāyam ihaiva tavātmabhāvo na nirvṛtto bhavet,
S06psp_4u:3717: kutas tvam anyam ātmabhāvaṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:3718: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06psp_4u:3720: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo 'yaṃ mārgapratirūpakam upadiśati,
S06psp_4u:3725: nānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartate. uttare cāsya harṣa utpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3726: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo mamaitāny aṅgāny upadiśati,
S06psp_4u:3727: yāni mayaivaṃ buddhvā sarveṣv api triṣu yāneṣu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_4u:3728: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ harṣitaṃ viditvā evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3729_0: icchasi tvaṃ kulaputra tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān draṣṭuṃ yair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair
S06psp_4u:3730_0: gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dānapāramitā
S06psp_4u:3730_1: paripūritā śīlapāramitā paripūritā kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā vīryapāramitā paripūritā
S06psp_4u:3731: gaṅgānadīvālukopamāś caiva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛcchitāḥ paripraśnīkṛtā,
S06psp_4u:3732: asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair bodhisattvayāne sthātavyaṃ?
S06psp_4u:3733: kathaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sthātavyam? evaṃ (PSP_4:151)
S06psp_4u:3735: yathā tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ākhyātaṃ tathā sthitvā tathā caritvā tathā yogam āpadyāpi tair eva tāvad bodhisattvair mahāsattvair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nābhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_4u:3736: tathā caritais tathānuśāsitais tathā sthitais tathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvākārajñatā nānuprāptā,
S06psp_4u:3737: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyasi?
S06psp_4u:3738: saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ vivecyamānasya cittasyānyathātvaṃ na bhavati nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3740: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo mamaitāny aṅgāny upadiśati,
S06psp_4u:3741: yair aṅgaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpyate sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat sarvākārajñatānuprāpyate.
S06psp_4u:3742: tataḥ sa punar māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittasyānavalīnatāṃ viditvā tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe saṃbahulān bhikṣūn abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_4u:3744: ime te 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravā ye te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā abhūvaṃs te 'rhattve sthitāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3745: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase?
S06psp_4u:3748: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratyudāvartyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
S06psp_4u:3750_0: asthānam anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3750_1: caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3750_2: carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_4u:3751: smṛtyupasthāneṣu caran samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu caran sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu carann apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu caran,
S06psp_4u:3757: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3758_0: saced evaṃ śikṣitvā yathā tathāgatenākhyātaṃ tayā caryayāvirahitasyaibhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_4u:3758_1: manasikārair avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate dānapāramitayā na parihīyate
S06psp_4u:3758_2: śīlapāramitayā na parihīyate kṣāntipāramitayā na parihīyate vīryapāramitayā na parihīyate
S06psp_4u:3758_3: dhyānapāramitayā na parihīyate prajñāpāramitayā na parihīyate adhyātmaśūnyatayā na
S06psp_4u:3758_5: na parihīyate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhir na parihīyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñābhir
S06psp_4u:3759: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3760_0: yo mārakarmāṇi budhyate sa na parihīyate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ebhiḥ subhūte
S06psp_4u:3760_1: ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_4u:3761: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3762: kuto bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti prajñāyate.
S06psp_4u:3766: dhātusaṃjñāyā āyatanasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃjñāyā rāgasaṃjñāyā doṣasaṃjñāyā mohasaṃjñāyā dṛṣṭisaṃjñāyāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3767: dānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ śīlapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ vīryapāramitāsaṃjñāyā dhyānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāsaṃjñāyā vivartito,
S06psp_4u:3774: bodhisattvasaṃjñāyā vivartito yāvad buddhasaṃjñāyā vivartitaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3775_0: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmair
S06psp_4u:3775_1: bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntaḥ. sa tam api dharmaṃ nopalabhate anupalabhamāno nābhisaṃskaroty
S06psp_4u:3775_2: anabhisaṃskurvan notpādayati tenocyate 'nutpādakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya ity,
S06psp_4u:3776: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3778: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vicchandayiṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3779: ākāśasamaiṣā yad uta sarvākārajñatā ākāśabhāvanaiṣā abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:3780: ete 'pi dharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā na cākāśasamair dharmair abhāvasvabhāvaiḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyaiḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:3781: yo vābhisaṃbudhyate yena vābhisaṃbudhyate yaṃ vābhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3782: sarva ete ākāśasamā dharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā nirarthakaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase mārakarma etat paridīpitaṃ yad iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhavyā,
S06psp_4u:3783_0: naitat samyaksaṃbuddhabhāṣitam iti. tasmāt tvaṃ kulaputra pratiprasrambhaya etān
S06psp_4u:3783_1: manasikārān mā te dīrgharātram anarthāya duṣkhāya vinipātāya saṃvarterann iti. tatra
S06psp_4u:3783_2: tair bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tāḥ paribhāṣāḥ śrutvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3784: mārakarmāṇo tāni yo me 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati kiṃ cāpy ākāśasamāḥ sarvadharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās,
S06psp_4u:3785_0: tān sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante tān vayam ākāśasamān abhāvasvabhāvān
S06psp_4u:3785_1: sarvadharmān svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāsaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbuddhya sattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:3790_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya imān dharmān śrutvā dṛḍhacittair bhavitavyam aprakampacittair
S06psp_4u:3791: ta ime yair dṛḍhacittatāyai aprakampacittatāyai asaṃhāryacittatāyai samanvāgatāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranto bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:3793: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3794: kiṃ punar bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ utāho vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3795: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3799: kathaṃ bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3800: kathaṃ ca vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3802: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā vinivartito 'yaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3803_0: yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā
S06psp_4u:3803_2: vaktavyaḥ. ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgatasyāvinivartanīyasya
S06psp_4u:3804: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo māreṇa pāpīyasā na śakyate vivecayitum anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3806: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3809: ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni samāpadyate samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3812: imaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir nirodhasamāpattibhiś ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:3813: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgam āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3816_0: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhṇāti na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ parigṛhṇāti
S06psp_4u:3816_1: na pratyekabodhiṃ parigṛhṇāti ākāṅkṣamāṇa evaṃ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāvena
S06psp_4u:3816_2: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti tam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir
S06psp_4u:3816_3: liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3817: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manasikāreṇa samanvāgato bodhicittenāvirahito na rūpaguruko bhavati na kṣaṇaguruko bhavati nāsravaguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3818: na dānaguruko bhavati na śīlaguruko bhavati na kṣāntiguruko bhavati na vīryaguruko bhavati na dhyānaguruko bhavati na prajñāguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3819_0: nāpramāṇaguruko bhavati nārūpyaguruko bhavati na samāpattiguruko bhavati nābhijñāguruko
S06psp_4u:3819_1: bhavati na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyadharmaguruko bhavati na sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiguruko
S06psp_4u:3819_2: bhavati na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaguruko bhavati nāryasatyaguruko bhavati na vaiśāradyaguruko
S06psp_4u:3819_3: bhavati na pratisaṃvidguruko bhavati na samyaksaṃbodhiguruko bhavati na sattvaparipācanaguruko
S06psp_4u:3819_4: bhavati na buddhadarśanaguruko bhavati na kuśalamūlāvaropanaguruko bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3820_0: tathā hi te sarvadharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ. sa khalu punaḥ
S06psp_4u:3820_1: subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ane imena ca manasikāreṇa samanvāgataś
S06psp_4u:3820_2: caturbhiś ceryāpathair abhikrāmati na pratikrāmati na bhrāntacitta āgacchati na bhrāntacitto
S06psp_4u:3821: na ca sthāsyati na niṣīdiṣyati na śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sa smṛta evāgamiṣyati gamiṣyati caṅkramiṣyati sthāsyati niṣīdiṣyati śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3822: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3824: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ paripācanāya pañcakāmaguṇān upadiśati sarvasattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3826: pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3828: parāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_4u:3829: ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3834: ye cānye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti samudaye dharmajñānam
S06psp_4u:3835: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasan jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3836: evaṃ cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ yāvat trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3837: na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte satatasamitaṃ brahmacārī bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3838: na ca kasyacid avamardanākāraṃ janayati yenāvamardanākāreṇa paro 'nāttamanāḥ syāt,
S06psp_4u:3839: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3840: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitaṃ vajrapānir yakṣaḥ sadānubaddho bhaviṣyaty,
S06psp_4u:3841: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_4u:3842: yathā mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satatasamitaṃ samanubaddho yāvat pañcavajrapāṇi kulāni satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:3843: sa na śakyate manuṣyair amanuṣyair vāvakramanāyānavamardanīyo (PSP_4:157)
S06psp_4u:3844: bhavati sa devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punarloke sahadharmeṇa. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3845: tasya cittaṃ na vikṣipyate bodhimanasikārād yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3846: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nendriyāṇi vikalāni bhavanti śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ sa satpuruṣo bhaviṣyati nāsatpuruṣaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3848: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3850: yadā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhicittaṃ na vinaṅkṣyate,
S06psp_4u:3851: etāvatā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3852: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3853_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimanasikāraiḥ samanvāgato yāni tāni
S06psp_4u:3853_1: strīṇām āveśanāni vaśīkaraṇāni mantravidyauṣadhibhaiṣajyāni tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa
S06psp_4u:3853_2: sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvan na prayukte na ca prayojayati na ca strīṇām āveśanam anyatarānyataraṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:3854: na striyāḥ puruṣasya vā ādeśanāprātihāryaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:3855: putro vā te bhaviṣyati dhītā vā te bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3857: dīrghāyuṣko vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3858: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3861: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānam
S06psp_4u:3862_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni
S06psp_4u:3862_1: liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo
S06psp_4u:3863: tān ākārāṃs tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:3864: tāni śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'ham,
S06psp_4u:3865: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt.
S06psp_4u:3867: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimanasikārair avirahito na skandhayogam anuyukto (PSP_4:158)
S06psp_4u:3868: viharati, na dhātvāyatanayogam anuyukto viharati. na pratītyasamutpādāṅgayogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3869: tathā hi sa śūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya hīnatvaṃ vā utkṛṣṭatvaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3870: na caurakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3871: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyāharaṇaṃ vā haranaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe dharmajñānam
S06psp_4u:3872: na senākathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3873: tathā hi sa prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyālpatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3874: na yuddhakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3875: tathā hi sarvadharmatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyānunayaṃ vā pratighaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na grāmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3876: tathā hi sarvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya nicayaṃ vāsaṃnicayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nagarakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3877: tathā hi sa ākāśaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vāsaṃgrahaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nigamakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3878: tathā hi subhūte koṭyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyātyayaṃ vānatyayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. nātmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3879: evaṃ na sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3880: atyantaviśuddhatvāt sarvadharmāṇām anyatra prajñāpāramitākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3881: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānam
S06psp_4u:3882: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caran na mātsaryakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3883: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran na dauḥśīlyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3884: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran na pratighakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3885: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran na kauśīdyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3886: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran na vikṣepakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3887: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dauṣprajñākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3888: sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ viharan dharmakāmaś caiva bhavati nādharmakāmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3889: sa dharmadhātau caran na bhedyasya dharmasya varṇavādī (PSP_4:159)
S06psp_4u:3890_0: bhavati, samitrakāmo bhavati nāmitrakāmo buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:3890_1: ca mahāsattvānāṃ ye ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikāḥ kulaputrās tān apy anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3892: darśanāya yatra lokadhātau tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:3894: sa imair manasikārair rātriṃdivaṃ viharati yad uta buddhamanasikāraiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3895_0: tathā hi prāyeṇa subhūte 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktān
S06psp_4u:3895_1: manasikārān utpādayitvā daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathair vartamānāḥ teṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_4u:3896_0: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:3896_1: tatra prathamaṃ dhyānam utpādayitvā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim utpādayitvā tatropapadyante,
S06psp_4u:3897: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:3898: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3899_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3899_1: carato 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya smṛtyupasthāne
S06psp_4u:3900: avinivartanīyo vāhaṃ na vāham avinivartanīya iti vicikitsā cāsya notpadyate. niḥsaṃśayaś ca bhavati svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3901: tathā hi so 'ṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3902_0: yo vivartate vā na vā vivartate. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphalabhūmau
S06psp_4u:3902_1: sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati svakāyāṃ bhūmāv evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvabhūmau
S06psp_4u:3902_2: sthito buddhabhūmau sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsaty,
S06psp_4u:3903: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. (PSP_4:160)
S06psp_4u:3904: sa tatrāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthito buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_4u:3908_0: sarvāṇi ca tāni mārakarmāṇi budhyate buddhvā ca vidhvastāni viralīkaroti. tadyathāpi
S06psp_4u:3908_1: nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakarmakārī ānantaryacittenāvirahito yāvan maraṇakālam
S06psp_4u:3910_0: anuvartate cāsya tat paryutthānaṃ yāvan maraṇakālam. evam eva subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya
S06psp_4u:3910_1: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ bhūtaṃ sthitam avinivartanīyabhūmāv
S06psp_4u:3911: na śakyate sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena vivartayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3912: tathā hi tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuram atikramya samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntaṃ sa svakāyāṃ bhūmau sthitvābhijñāparamapāramitāḥ prāpya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_4u:3915: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayitvā tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati paripraśnayati paryupāste.
S06psp_4u:3916: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathā sthitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3917: sa māna utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇy avabudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3918: utpannotpannānāñ ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena na gacchati,
S06psp_4u:3919: tāni ca mārakarmāṇy upāyakauśalyena bhūtakoṭīḥ śodhayati,
S06psp_4u:3920: svakāyāñ ca bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3922: na bhūtakoṭim ekāṃ vā dve vā vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:3923: tasya jātivinivṛttasyāpi na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3924: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti mārge dharmajñānam
S06psp_4u:3925_0: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu
S06psp_4u:3925_1: na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyate.
S06psp_4u:3927: abhisaṃbhotsya evāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3928: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_4u:3930: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthitaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,
S06psp_4u:3932: anavamardanīyaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3933: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati.
S06psp_4u:3934: sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3937: na ca tvayānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdho,
S06psp_4u:3938: yena tvaṃ vyākriyathās tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:3939: na ca tvayi te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:3940: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_4u:3941: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3942: na ca cittasyānyathā tvaṃ bhavati veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3943: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyākṛto 'haṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3944: tathā hi mama te dharmāḥ saṃvidyante yair dharmair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākriyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3945: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3946: mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣaḥ śrāvakatve tvaṃ kulaputra vyākṛto na tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:3948: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3949: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkrānto mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
S06psp_4u:3950: na ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā samādāpayati.
S06psp_4u:3951: saced ayam asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3952: naitad buddhabhāṣitaṃ na śrāvakair mārabhāṣitāny etāni sūtrāṇi yatra tvaṃ carasi. veditavyam etad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
S06psp_4u:3953: yo mām amuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati. veditavyam etat subhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair (PSP_4:162)
S06psp_4u:3954: arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3955: tathā hy asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ta ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06psp_4u:3956: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3957_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartaniyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_4u:3957_1: saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti.
S06psp_4u:3957_2: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenaiva yogam
S06psp_4u:3957_4: tatra kataro dharmo yasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti
S06psp_4u:3958: iha subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_4u:3959: tatraike mohapuruṣāḥ pratikrośanti prativahanti naiṣa dharmo na vinayo naitac chāstuḥ śāsanam,
S06psp_4u:3960: asya subhūte kṛtaśo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3961: ye 'pi te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyante,
S06psp_4u:3962_0: aham api tatra gaṇanāṃ yāsyāmy aham api tatra vyākṛto mamāpy eṣa dharmo yasya dharmasya
S06psp_4u:3962_1: kṛtenāham ātmaparityāgaṃ karomi jīvitaparityāgaṃ karomīmaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya
S06psp_4u:3962_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgaṃ karoti jīvitaparityāgaṃ karoty,
S06psp_4u:3963: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3964: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:3965: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvam udgṛhṇāti tathodgṛhītañ ca samānaṃ na vipraṇāśayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3967: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3968: katamasyā bhagavan dhāraṇyāḥ pratilabdhatvād bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti?
S06psp_4u:3971: dhāraṇadhāraṇīpratilabdhasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti.
S06psp_4u:3973_0: tathāgatasyaiva bhagavann arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na śrāvakabhāṣitāni na devabhāṣitāni
S06psp_4u:3973_1: na nāgabhāṣitāni na yakṣabhāṣitāni na gandharvabhāṣitāni nāsurabhāṣitāni na garuḍabhāṣitāni
S06psp_4u:3975: ye kecit subhūte rutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ sarvatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3977: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3978: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3983: evam etat subhūte evam etat mahāguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_4u:3985: parimitaguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3986: tathā hy anenānantam aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdham asaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhais,
S06psp_4u:3987: tatra ca jñāne sthitvāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharati yābhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir abhinirhṛtābhiḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyaḥ paryādātum.
S06psp_4u:3989: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3990_1: mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān ākāraliṅganimittāni nirdeṣṭuṃ yair ākārair
S06psp_4u:3990_2: yair liṅgair yair nimittair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prabhāvyate sādhu
S06psp_4u:3990_3: bhagavan gambhīrāṇi gambhirāṇi sthānāni nirdiśatu yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_4u:3990_4: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_4u:3999: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4001: sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām arthāya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni paripṛcchitavyāni manyase,
S06psp_4u:4002_0: gambhīram iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam ānimittasyāpraṇihitasyānabhisaṃskārasyānutpādasyānirodhasyānirvāṇasyāśāntasya
S06psp_4u:4002_1: tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer dharmadhātor imāni tāni subhūte gambhīragambhīrāṇi sthānāni
S06psp_4u:4002_2: yeṣām etad adhivacanaṃ yad idaṃ nirvāṇam iti.
S06psp_4u:4004: nirvāṇasyaivaitad bhagavann adhivacanaṃ na punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām?
S06psp_4u:4006: sarvadharmāṇām evaitat subhūte 'dhivacanaṃ gambhīram iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4011: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi subhūte gambhīraṃ,
S06psp_4u:4015: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā subhūte gambhīrā. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo,
S06psp_4u:4020: evam abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ subhūte gambhīraḥ. pratītyasamutpādaḥ subhūte gambhīro,

S06psp_4u:4198: syād bhagavan paryāyo yad rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:4199: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api bhagavann asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
S06psp_4u:4202: syāt subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:4204: vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syād ity asaṃkhyeyādīnām upalakṣaṇām.
S06psp_4u:4205: katamena bhagavan paryāyeṇa rūpam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:4207: vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt?
S06psp_4u:4209: rūpaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃ khyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4211: vijñānaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
S06psp_4u:4213: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpam eva śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4219: subhūte na mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity ākhyātāḥ.
S06psp_4u:4222: ye ca bhagavan śūnyā akṣayā api te,
S06psp_4u:4223: asaṃkhyeyā api te aprameyā api te,
S06psp_4u:4229: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_4u:4232: naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate. anabhilapyam etat subhūte tathāgatenābhilapitam,
S06psp_4u:4233_0: akṣayam iti vā asaṃkhyeyam iti vā aprameyam iti vā aparimāṇam iti vā śūnyam iti vā
S06psp_4u:4233_1: ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā anabhisaṃskāram iti vā anutpāda iti vā virāga
S06psp_4u:4233_2: iti vā nirodha iti vā nirvāṇam iti vā deśanāniṣpandanirdeśa eṣa subhūte tathāgatasyākṣayam
S06psp_4u:4233_3: iti yāvan nirvāṇam iti ceti codyapūrvakas tathāgatakaruṇāniṣpandanirdeśaḥ.
S06psp_4u:4234: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4235: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathāgatena deśyate,
S06psp_4u:4236: sā ca dharmatā anabhilapyā yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi,
S06psp_4u:4242: yā subhūte dharmāṇām anabhilapyatā sā śūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:4245: kiṃ punar bhagavann anabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā?
S06psp_4u:4247: na subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇir.
S06psp_4u:4249: saced bhagavann anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇiḥ,
S06psp_4u:4250: dānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4251: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4252: prajñāpāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4253: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4254: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4255: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4256: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām āryasatyānāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānaṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4257_0: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na vṛddhir
S06psp_4u:4257_1: na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_4u:4257_2: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4258: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati. saced bhagavann āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4259: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4260: tadā abhavyā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum ity anabhilapyasya hānivṛddhyā bhāvena codyam.
S06psp_4u:4263_0: nānabhilapyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06psp_4u:4263_1: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4269: 'haṃ dānapāramitayā vivarddhe. eṣa ca punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:4272: caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_4u:4274_0: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś
S06psp_4u:4274_1: cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati yathānuttarā
S06psp_4u:4275: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4276: katamā ca punar bhagavann anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06psp_4u:4280: katamaiṣā bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā yānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06psp_4u:4282: yā subhūte rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyās tathatā yā saṃjñayāḥ tathatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā yā vijñānasya tathatā,
S06psp_4u:4283: evaṃ yā skandhatathatā yā dhātutathatā yā āyatanatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā,
S06psp_4u:4284: evaṃ yāvad yā nirvāṇasya tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:4285: sā naiva vivarddhate na parihīyate. tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito 'bhīksṇaṃ bahulaṃ viharati,
S06psp_4u:4286: na kasyacid dharmasya vṛddhiṃ vā parihāṇiṃ vā samanupaśyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:4287: evaṃ ca subhūte dānapāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:4288: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:4289_0: evaṃ śūnyatānāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
S06psp_4u:4289_2: daśānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:4289_3: na vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4292: tat kiṃ prathamacittotpādena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4293: utāho paścimena cittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_4u:4294: yadi tāvad bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāṃ (PSP_4:175)
S06psp_4u:4298: evam asamavasṛtānāṃ bhagavaṃś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ kuśalamūlāny upacayaṃ gacchanti,
S06psp_4u:4299: na cānupacitaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_4u:4302: tena hi subhūte upamāṃ te kariṣyāmy asyaivārthasya vijñāpanāya,
S06psp_4u:4303: upamayā ihaikatyā vidvāṃsaḥ puruṣā bhāṣitasyārtham ājñāsyanti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:4304: subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalitasya dīpyamānāyāṃ vartau prathamābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
S06psp_4u:4307: na bhagavan prathamābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā na ca prathamābhinipātam anāgamyārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
S06psp_4u:4308: na bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
S06psp_4u:4309: na ca paścimābhinipātam anāgamyārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā.
S06psp_4u:4312: subhūte api nu sā vartir dagdhā.
S06psp_4u:4316: evam eva subhūte na prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4317: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4318: na ca paścimacittotpādena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4319_0: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:4319_1: abhisaṃbudhyate. abhisaṃbudhyate ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:4319_2: atra hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam
S06psp_4u:4319_3: upādāya daśa bhūmīḥ paripūrayitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_4u:4321: katamā bhagavan daśa bhūmīḥ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_4u:4323: śuklavipaśyanābhūmiṃ subhūte paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4324: evaṃ gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvībhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim (PSP_4:176)
S06psp_4u:4326: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4327: bodhisattvabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4328: buddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4329: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu bhūmiṣu śikṣamāṇo na ca prathamacittotpādenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4330: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4332: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4333: abhisaṃbudhyate ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhim.
S06psp_4u:4338: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4339: na ca nāma bhagavan paścimena cittotpādena,
S06psp_4u:4340: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:4341: abhisaṃbudhyate ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim.
S06psp_4u:4344: subhūte yac cittaṃ niruddham api nu tat punar evotpatsyate.
S06psp_4u:4349: subhūte yac cittam utpannam api nu tan nirodhadharmi.
S06psp_4u:4365: subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā bhūtakoṭir bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:4385: subhūte api nu tathatā tathatāṃ samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:4401: sa na kutracic carati. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_4u:4402: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ete samudācārā na bhavanti,
S06psp_4u:4403: na samudācaranti tathatāyāṃ sthitasya na bhagavan kiñcit samudācārati,
S06psp_4u:4404: nāpi tatra kaścit samudācarati. iti caryāgāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:4405: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4406: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati sa kutra carati?
S06psp_4u:4408: carati bhagavan paramārthe yatra dvayasamudācāro na saṃvidyate.
S06psp_4u:4411: subhūte yaḥ paramārthe carati samudācāre carati,
S06psp_4u:4417: subhūte api nu tena nimittasaṃjñā vānimittasaṃjñā vā vibhāvitā bhavati.
S06psp_4u:4422: tat kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nimittasaṃjñā vā ānimittasaṃjñā vā na vibhāvitā bhavati?
S06psp_4u:4423: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4424: na bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ prayujyate,
S06psp_4u:4425: nimittaṃ vā bhāvayiṣyāmy animittaṃ vā bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_4u:4426_0: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nāparipūrṇair
S06psp_4u:4426_1: daśabhis tathāgatabalair caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir mahāmaitryā
S06psp_4u:4426_2: mahākaruṇayā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_4u:4426_3: idaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena
S06psp_4u:4426_4: na kaṃcid dharmaṃ bhāvī vā karoty abhāvī vā karoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4427: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitas,
S06psp_4u:4428: tatra ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā trīn samādhīn samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:4429: sattvānāṃ kṛtaśas taiś ca samādhibhiḥ sattvān paripācayati.
S06psp_4u:4430: evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trīn samādhīn samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:4431: tatra ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trīṣu samādhiṣu sthitvā sattvāṃś ca praṇidhānena caratas tān apraṇihitena niyojayati,
S06psp_4u:4432: sattvāṃś ca vikalpe caratas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_4u:4433_0: sattvāṃś ca nimitte caratas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ānimitte pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_4u:4433_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tribhiḥ samādhibhiḥ
S06psp_4u:4434: ity upāyakauśalaṃ gāmbhīryam ity uktaḥ śaikṣo 'vaivartiko gaṇaḥ
S06psp_4u:4435: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_4u:4436: ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatas trīn samādhīn samāpadyate śūnyatām ānimittam apraṇihitam,
S06psp_4u:4438: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4439: yady āyuṣman śāriputra divase bhāvanayā vivardhate,
S06psp_4u:4440: evaṃ svapnāntaragato 'pi vivardhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4441: avikalpaḥ, atha khalv āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaś ca,
S06psp_4u:4442: saced āyuṣman śāriputra yadi divase bodhisattvasya (PSP_4:179)
S06psp_4u:4444: tadā svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhaviṣyati. iti bhavaśāntyor akalpanā
S06psp_4u:4445: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4446: yat punar āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragataḥ karma karoti,
S06psp_4u:4447: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā,
S06psp_4u:4449: tathā nāsya bhavaty ācayo vā upacayo vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4450: na hi svapne kasyacid dharmasyācavo vā upacayo vā upalabhyate. atha vibuddho vikalpayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4452: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4454: yaś ca svapnāntare hatas taṃ prativibudho vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:4455: aho hato mayā hataḥ sādhu hata iti,
S06psp_4u:4458: nāyuṣman subhūte anārambaṇakarmotpadyate sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate.
S06psp_4u:4460_0: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ cetanotpadyate
S06psp_4u:4460_1: sārambaṇam evāyuṣman śāriputra karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ sārambaṇā cetanotpadyate
S06psp_4u:4461: nādṛṣṭair nāśrutair nāmatair nāvijñātair dharmair buddhiḥ pravartate. tatra kācid buddhiḥ saṃkleśaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_4u:4463: tasmāt tarhy āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate nānārambaṇā.
S06psp_4u:4465: yady āyuṣman subhūte sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāś cetanā viviktā uktā bhagavatā,
S06psp_4u:4466: tat kathaṃ sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4469: nimittīkṛtyāyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4471: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4472: yady āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ (PSP_4:180)
S06psp_4u:4474: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:4475: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4476: ayam āyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūta ekajātipratibaddho bhagavatāvinivartanīyatāyai vyākṛta eṣa paripraṣṭavya eṣa visarjayiṣyati.
S06psp_4u:4477: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4479: ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūta ekajātipratibaddho bhagavato 'vinivartanīyatāyai vyākṛta eṣa paripraṣṭavya eṣa visarjayiṣyatīti.
S06psp_4u:4480: evam ukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4481: tat kiṃ nāmadheyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo visarjayiṣyaty,
S06psp_4u:4486: yā vedanāśūnyatā yā saṃjñāśūnyatā yā saṃskāraśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:4488: yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā na sā pratibalā visarjayituṃ,
S06psp_4u:4489: yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā yā saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na sā pratibalā visarjayitum?
S06psp_4u:4490: tat kiṃ visarjayiṣyati nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4494: tam apy ahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4498: tam apy ahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi sarva ete dharmā advayā advaidhīkārāḥ.
S06psp_4u:4499: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4500: kaścit tvayā maitreya ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtā yathaitān dharmān bhāṣase?
S06psp_4u:4502: na mayaite dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtā yathāham etān dharmān bhāṣe.
S06psp_4u:4504_0: gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathāpi nāma dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4506: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4508: śāriputra samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yena tvaṃ dharmeṇārhann iti prabhāvyase.
S06psp_4u:4512: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_4u:4513: ayaṃ dharmo vyākariṣyaty ayaṃ dharmo vyākriyate ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. evañ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati,

S06psp_4u:4516: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ carati sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evañ caran śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,

S06psp_4u:4637: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratābhimānikān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4640: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre 'bhimānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ śabdo 'pi na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate,

S06psp_4u:4643: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4645: sacet me tatra buddhakṣetre mitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ syād mitā ca prabhā,

S06psp_4u:4651: amitaś ca bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:4652: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4653: yāvanti gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāvanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ yāvan na bhaven na tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,

S06psp_4u:4656_1: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bhavanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:4656_2: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
