S06psp_4u:4664: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi gaṅgadevā nāma bhaginī saṃnipatitābhut saṃniṣaṇṇā,
S06psp_4u:4665: sotthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jāmumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya (PSP_4:190)
S06psp_4u:4667: ahaṃ bhagavann ahaṃ sugata ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvaivaṃrūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhīṣye yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddheneha prajñāpāramitāyām upadiṣṭam.
S06psp_4u:4668: atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpaṃ gṛhītvā,
S06psp_4u:4672_0: suvarṇavarṇapītavarṇaṃ ca puṣpayugaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tena kṣipati sma. samanantarakṣiptaṃ
S06psp_4u:4672_1: ca tad dūṣyayugam atha tāvad eva buddhānubhāvenopari vaihāyasam antarīkṣe bhagavato
S06psp_4u:4673: caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ samaṃ bhāgaśo ghaṭitaṃ suvibhaktaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
S06psp_4u:4674: atha khalu sā strīs tatkūṭāgāraṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_4u:4675: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ striyā adhyāśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot,
S06psp_4u:4676: dharmatā khalu punar eṣā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitaṃ prāduḥ kurvanti.
S06psp_4u:4677_0: atha khalu tāvad evānekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo bhagavato mukhadvārād niścaranti sma.
S06psp_4u:4677_1: tadyathāpi nāma nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātā māñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikarajatavarṇās tān anantāparyantān
S06psp_4u:4677_2: lokadhātūn gatvā punar evāgatya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhny antarhitāḥ.
S06psp_4u:4678_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ cīvaraṃ pravaritvā dakṣiṇaṃ
S06psp_4u:4678_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4681: smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
S06psp_4u:4682: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4683_0: iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06psp_4u:4683_1: loke bhaviṣyati tārakopame kalpe 'yam ānanda etasyā gaṅgadevāyā bhaginyāś caramaḥ
S06psp_4u:4683_2: strībhāvo bhaviṣyati. iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivarjya puruṣabhāvaṃ
S06psp_4u:4684: sa tatra brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati. asya khalu punar ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya suvarṇapuṣpa iti nāmadheyaṃ (PSP_4:191)
S06psp_4u:4685: bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punar ānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tataś cyutaḥ samāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4687: tadyathāpi nāṃ ānanda rājā cakravartī prāsādena prāsādaṃ caṅkrāmati,
S06psp_4u:4688: sa yāvajjīvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ nākrāmati yāvan maraṇakālam iti. evam evānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4691: yāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tatra buddhaksetre saṃnipatitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:4693: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasā cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4695_0: tathāgatasaṃnipātaḥ sa veditavyo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ suvarṇapuṣpasya
S06psp_4u:4695_1: ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhaksetre na pramāṇabaddho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4696: na śakyaṃ tasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pramāṇaṃ kartum,
S06psp_4u:4705_1: khalu punar ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:4705_2: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetra ime doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante,
S06psp_4u:4707: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4708: kva bhagavann etayā gaṅgadevayā kuśalamūlam avaropitam?
S06psp_4u:4710: dīpaṅkarasyānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike etayā bhaginyā kuśalamūlam avaropitam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4711: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4712: sa ca dīpaṅkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpair abhyavakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā,
S06psp_4u:4713: yadā mayā ānanda dīpaṃkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pañcabhir (PSP_4:192)
S06psp_4u:4715_0: tadāhaṃ tena dīpaṃkareṇa bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena kuśalamūlasamanvāgato
S06psp_4u:4715_1: 'yam iti viditvā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvani
S06psp_4u:4715_2: sākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
S06psp_4u:4715_3: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho bhagavāṃs tadā
S06psp_4u:4715_4: mamaitayā bhaginyā vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittam utpāditam,
S06psp_4u:4716: aho batāham apy anāgate 'dhvani evaṃ vyākriyeyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:4717_0: yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. evam ānandaitayā bhaginyā
S06psp_4u:4717_1: tasya dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamaṃ cittam anuttarāyai
S06psp_4u:4718: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4719: kṛtaparikarmā bhagavann iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:4723: kṛtaparikarmā ānandaiṣā gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:4725: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4726: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:4732: yāvat kathaṃ bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:4735: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4736: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣitavyam,
S06psp_4u:4742: evaṃ yāvat kāmadhātuḥ śūnya iti pratyavekṣitavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:4744: ārūpyadhātuḥ śūnya iti pratyavekṣitavyaḥ. tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4745: yathā pratyavekṣamāṇas tac cittaṃ na vikṣipati,
S06psp_4u:4749: asamanupaśyan na sākṣātkaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4750: tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmaiḥ suśikṣito na kasyacid dharmasya vyavacchedaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:4754: sarvāṃs tān dharmān na saṃyuktān na visaṃyuktān samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:4755: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4757: na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyā dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyā iti. kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
S06psp_4u:4759: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06psp_4u:4763: nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate. asamāhita eva bodhisattvo mahāsattva āraṃbaṇe cittam upanibadhnāti,
S06psp_4u:4764: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣair dharmair,
S06psp_4u:4765: na cāsravakṣayaṃ sākṣātkaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4766: evam udārajñānasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4767: yo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sthita evaṃ jānāti parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti.
S06psp_4u:4768: tena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4776: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya bhāvanāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:4778: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:4784: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratilābhāyāyaṃ kālaḥ pratisaṃvitpratilābhāyāyaṃ kālo, (PSP_4:194)
S06psp_4u:4792: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran śūnyatāyāṃ ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:4797: apraṇihitena ca viharati. smṛtyupasthānāni ca bhāvayati smṛtyupasthānaiś ca viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni,
S06psp_4u:4798: āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ ca mārgañ ca bhāvayaty āryāṣṭāṅgikena ca mārgeṇa viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti.
S06psp_4u:4799: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:4800: bodhipakṣyāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayati bodhipakṣyaiś ca dharmair viharati,
S06psp_4u:4801: na ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti na ca sakṛdāgāmiphalan na cānāgāmiphalan nārhattvaphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti. ity upāyakauśalaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:4802: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣaḥ śūraś ca bhaved,
S06psp_4u:4811: sarvāsu ca catuḥṣaṣṭhiṣu kalāsu pariniṣpanno bhavet,
S06psp_4u:4812: sarvatra ca śilpasthāneṣu ca karmasthāneṣu ca gatiṃgato bhavet,
S06psp_4u:4814: sa yāṃ yām eva ca kāṃścit kriyām ārabheta sarvatra tatra tatra ca lābhasatkārasamanvāgato bhavet,
S06psp_4u:4815: tena ca bahujanaṃ satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet,
S06psp_4u:4816_0: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sa mātāpitṛputradārān
S06psp_4u:4816_1: gṛhītvā kenacid eva karaṇīyena mahābhayabhairavam aṭavīkāntāraṃ praviṣṭas syād bālānāṃ
S06psp_4u:4817: tatra ca sa puruṣaḥ praviśya tān mātāpitṛputradārān (PSP_4:195)
S06psp_4u:4819_0: mā bhaiṣṭa mā bhaiṣṭāhaṃ yuṣmān ito mahābhayabhairavād aṭavīkāntārād bālānāṃ bhīṣaṇāt
S06psp_4u:4819_1: sa romaharṣaṇāc chīghram evāpakrāmayiṣyāmi śīghram eva parimocayiṣyāmi. tasya ca
S06psp_4u:4819_2: puruṣasya tatrāṭavīkāntāre bahavo 'mitrā vadhakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:4820: sa ca puruṣaḥ parameṇa prajñābalena samanvāgato bhavet,
S06psp_4u:4821_0: sa tān parimocayitvā mātāpitṛputradārāṃs tasmād aṭavīkāntārān niṣkāśayitvā punar
S06psp_4u:4821_1: eva grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā janapradeśaṃ vā gatvā prītisaumanasya
S06psp_4u:4822: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānām antike pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāṃ vā manaḥ praduṣayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4823: tathā hi sa kṛtayogyaḥ sarvāsu ca kalāsu bhavet,
S06psp_4u:4824: tena tatrāṭavīkāntāre bahutarāś ca śūratarāś ca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarāś ca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇām anye udāratarāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā abhinirmitā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:4825: te tena bhayena sarve 'pagatā bhaveyuḥ. atha sa puruṣas tān mātāpitṛputradārān svastinā parimocayitvā sukhaṃ viharet.
S06psp_4u:4826_0: evam eva subhūte yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām antike maitryārambaṇena
S06psp_4u:4826_1: cittena karuṇāmuditopekṣārambaṇena cittena sphāritvā viharaty atrāntare subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:4826_2: mahāsattvo na cānimittena vyāhriyate na cānimittasamādhiṃ sākṣātkriyayā śrāvakabhūmau
S06psp_4u:4828: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunir antarīkṣe carati na ca bhūmau patati,
S06psp_4u:4829: ākāśe vāntarīkṣe viharati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati na pratiṣṭhate. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ ca parijayaṃ karoti śūnyatayā ca viharati,
S06psp_4u:4830: ānimitte ca parijayaṃ karoty ānimittena ca viharaty,
S06psp_4u:4831: apraṇihite ca parijayaṃ karoty apraṇihitena ca viharati,
S06psp_4u:4832: na ca śūnyatāṃ vānimittaṃ vāpraṇihitaṃ vā sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_4u:4833: yayā sākṣātkriyayā śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pated,
S06psp_4u:4834_0: aparipūrṇair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir
S06psp_4u:4834_1: aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā cāparimāṇeṣu ca buddhadharmeṣu
S06psp_4u:4836_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavān iṣvastrācāryo bhaved iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ
S06psp_4u:4836_1: sa kāṇḍam ūrdhvamukhaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍais tasya pūrvakasya kāṇḍasya paraṃparayā
S06psp_4u:4836_2: pṛthivyāṃ patanaṃ na dadyāt tāvat kāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ na patati yāvat sa puruṣa ākāṅkṣet.
S06psp_4u:4836_3: atha khalv etat kāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nipatet,
S06psp_4u:4839_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena
S06psp_4u:4839_1: parigṛhītas tāvat tāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti yāvan na tāni kuśalamūlāni
S06psp_4u:4840_0: yadā tāni kuśalamūlāni paripakvāni bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadā tāṃ
S06psp_4u:4840_1: paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_4u:4840_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam eteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatopanidhyātavyā upaparīkṣitavyāḥ.
S06psp_4u:4842: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4843_0: duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya iha dharmatāyāṃ śikṣate bhūtakoṭyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4843_1: śikṣate dharmadhātau śikṣate atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4847: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ. yasya subhūte sarvasattvā aparityaktās tasyaivaṃrūpaḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣo bhavati,
S06psp_4u:4848: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittam abhinirharati,
S06psp_4u:4850: asaṃvidyamānair dharmair vartamānāḥ śāntaṃ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukham abhinirharaty,
S06psp_4u:4853: upāyakauśalyasamanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tasmin samaye veditavyo,
S06psp_4u:4854: na cāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti yāvan na sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. ity asādhāraṇopāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:4855: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yānīmāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣitukāmo bhavati,
S06psp_4u:4856: tadyathedam adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ (PSP_4:197)
S06psp_4u:4859_0: dīrgharātram ime sattvā ātmasaṃjñāyāṃ sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ jantusaṃjñāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4859_1: poṣasaṃjñāyāṃ puruṣasaṃjñāyāṃ pudgalasaṃjñāyāṃ manujasaṃjñāyāṃ mānavasaṃjñāyāṃ kārakasaṃjñāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4860: teṣām upalambhadṛṣṭiprahāṇāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhaṃ bhāvayaty,
S06psp_4u:4861: ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ bhāvayaty apraṇihitaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ bhāvayati samāpadyate ca na ca bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_4u:4865: tasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpnuyād na sakṛdāgāmiphalan nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnuyāt,
S06psp_4u:4867_0: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena cittotpādena etaiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgato
S06psp_4u:4867_1: nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti na ca parihīyate caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś
S06psp_4u:4867_2: catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir
S06psp_4u:4867_3: ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgikena
S06psp_4u:4867_4: mārgeṇa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhir adhyātmaśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na parihīyate,
S06psp_4u:4875: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhair na parihīyate pañcabhir abhijñābhir daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir na parihīyate,
S06psp_4u:4877_0: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā na parihīyate. evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tasmin samaye
S06psp_4u:4877_1: sarvabodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ samanvāgato na ca parihīyate tato yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:4879: tīkṣṇatamāni cāsyendriyāṇi bhavanti yathā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām. ity aśaktyupāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:4880: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:4881: dīrgharātram ime sattvāś caturbhir viparyāsair viparyastacittā nityasaṃjñāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñāyāṃ śubhasaṃjñāyām ātmasaṃjñāyāñ ca teṣām arthāya bodhaye cariṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4882: tathā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4883: yathānityam iti duḥkham ity aśubham iti anātmīyam iti vā samudācāro 'pi na bhaviṣyati. so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgata upāyakauśalyena ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_4u:4884_1: vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā
S06psp_4u:4885: na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_4u:4886: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:4889_0: rūpam iti vā vedaneti vā saṃjñeti vā saṃskārā iti vā vijñānam iti vā skandhā iti
S06psp_4u:4889_1: vā dhātava iti vā āyatanānīti vā pratītyasamutpādā iti vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānīti
S06psp_4u:4889_2: vā caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhis teṣāṃ tathā
S06psp_4u:4889_3: kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya sattvānām ete upalambhadoṣā na bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:4890_0: sa imaiś cittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato 'nena copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_4u:4890_1: na bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroty apūrṇair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś
S06psp_4u:4890_2: catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā
S06psp_4u:4890_3: ca śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhaṃ tasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāvanā
S06psp_4u:4891: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:4892: dīrgharātram ime sattvā nimittena caritāḥ strīnimitteṣu vā puruṣanimitteṣu vā rūpanimitteṣu vā ārūpyanimitteṣu (PSP_4:199)
S06psp_4u:4893: vā, teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya,
S06psp_4u:4894_0: eṣāṃ sattvānām ime doṣā na bhaviṣyanti. sa tena cittotpādena samanvāgato 'nena copāyakauśalyena
S06psp_4u:4894_1: samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cāntarā bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroty aparipūrṇair
S06psp_4u:4894_2: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir
S06psp_4u:4894_3: āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca tasya tena cittotpādena samanvāgatasyānimittasamādhivimokṣamukhaṃ
S06psp_4u:4894_4: tasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati. ity ānimittopāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:4895: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:4896: dīrgharātram ime sattvāḥ praṇidhānena caritā yad uta śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ lokapālatvaṃ cakravartitvam abhilaṣanti rūpam abhilaṣanti evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān,
S06psp_4u:4898_0: teṣām aham arthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tathā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi
S06psp_4u:4898_1: yathaiva te sattvānāṃ praṇidhānadoṣā na bhaviṣyantīti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06psp_4u:4898_2: mahāsattvasya ebhiś cittotpādair ebhiś ca kuśalamūlair anena copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06psp_4u:4901: aparipūrṇair daśabhir balair vaiśāradyaiḥ pratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha iti,
S06psp_4u:4902_0: asthānaiḥ subhūte 'navakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4902_3: caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu
S06psp_4u:4902_4: mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ caran yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran parijayaṃ kurvāṇa,
S06psp_4u:4903: evaṃ jñānadharmasamanvāgato 'nabhisaṃskāre vā pateta traidhātukena vā sārdhaṃ saṃvasen naitat sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_4u:4905: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva eṣu bodhipākṣikeṣu (PSP_4:200)
S06psp_4u:4906_0: dharmeṣu caran parijayaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paripraṣṭavyaḥ. kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
S06psp_4u:4906_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caritvā parijayaṃ kṛtvā na
S06psp_4u:4908: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā nāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekāṃ vā bodhim anuprāpnuyāt?
S06psp_4u:4909: kathaṃ śūnyatām ānimittam apraṇihitam anabhisaṃskāram anutpādam abhāvaṃ vā sākṣātkuryāt prajñāpāramitāṃ ca bhāvayed? iti.
S06psp_4u:4910: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvair mahāsattvair evaṃ paripṛcchamāna evaṃ vyākuryāc,
S06psp_4u:4915: na ca sarvasattvāḥ parityaktavyā iti. veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4916: tathā hi yo 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parijayaṃ sūcayati taṃ vyākaroti taṃ prabhāvayati.
S06psp_4u:4917: sacet punaḥ subhūte pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryān,
S06psp_4u:4919: nānimitte nāpraṇihite nānabhisaṃskāre nānutpāde nābhāve na tena bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ parijayaḥ kartavyo,
S06psp_4u:4920: na ca sarvasattvāḥ samālambitavyā iti. veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4921: tathā hi yo 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parijayaṃ taṃ na sūcayati taṃ na vyākaroti taṃ na prabhāvayati,
S06psp_4u:4922: yaḥ punar avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmaṃ taṃ na sūcayati na vyākaroti na bhāvayati,
S06psp_4u:4923_0: veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parijayaṃ
S06psp_4u:4923_1: kṛtvā tato bhūmer atikrānto yāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyabhūmiḥ.
S06psp_4u:4925: syāt punar bhagavan paryāyo yad avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo (PSP_4:201)
S06psp_4u:4928: syāt subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śrutvā vāśrutvā vā evaṃ visarjayed yathāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_4u:4929: veditavyas tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair avinivartanīyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06psp_4u:4931: tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhāya caranti,
S06psp_4u:4932: alpakās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ visarjayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:4936: evam etat subhūte evam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4937: tathā hi subhūte 'lpakās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau,
S06psp_4u:4938: ye punas te vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti ta evaṃ visarjayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:4939: uttaptakuśalamūlās te veditavyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena. ity apramāṇaviṣayopāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:4942: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvākārābhisaṃbodhādhikāras tathatāparivartaś caturthaḥ
